source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000010_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>The people of this city have spirit, I'll give them that. They've not lost the will to fight.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000010_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Die Bewohner dieser Stadt sind zäh. Ihr Wille, für ihre Zukunft zu kämpfen, ist ungebrochen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000020_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>I can imagine how torn you must feel, looking at that sky. Knowing what it means to everyone...and that you're responsible.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000020_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Aber das macht es gerade so schwer für dich, nicht wahr? Dass du jetzt zwischen ihnen und ihrer Zukunft stehst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>The secrecy is worse. I'd rather people knew.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Es sind gute Leute.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I still can't believe it's coming from me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Es ist nicht meine Schuld.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A1_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>It's all such a mess.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A1_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ich versuche, nicht darüber nachzudenken.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000030_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>If you're thinking of coming clean, don't. It might make <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> feel better, but it would make things a hundred times worse for them. They're better off not knowing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000030_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Das sind sie<var 1D /var>... Sie dürfen dein Geheimnis nicht erfahren, die Wahrheit wäre unerträglich. Besser, es bleibt alles, wie es ist.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000040_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab><sigh> Neither can I, to be honest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000040_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Natürlich nicht. Du würdest niemals absichtlich jemandem schaden. Ich weiß das.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000050_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>But you heard what the Ascian said: the Light you shine will warp the world around you whether you like it or not. Even Y'shtola and Ryne had to concede that point.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000050_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Aber es ist, wie Emet-Selch gesagt hat. Dein Licht ist eine Bedrohung für diese Welt. Da können Y'shtola und Ryne noch so sehr über dich wachen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000060_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Aye. An all too familiar one. Here you stand alone, expecting no one else to bear the burden for you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000060_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Das verstehe ich nur zu gut. Aber trotzdem stehst du hier, allein<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000070_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>You're in a corner, and there doesn't seem to be any obvious way out.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000070_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Um ehrlich zu sein, stecken wir ganz schön in der Patsche. Wie soll es denn jetzt weitergehen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000080_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>...But that doesn't mean it's over. However hopeless it seems, you haven't lost yet.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000080_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Womit ich nicht sagen will, dass der Kampf verloren ist. Du gibst dich nicht so schnell geschlagen, habe ich Recht?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000090_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>I remember looking up at the sky like this before─being caught up in a strange kind of calm.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000090_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ich habe schon einmal so in den Himmel gesehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000100_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>It was after we realized we were responsible for the Flood. When we resolved to journey to the Source by taking our own lives.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000100_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Als ich begriff, dass mein Tun zu der Lichtflut geführt hatte. Als ich mein Leben beendete, um in den Ursprung gehen zu können.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000110_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>One last sacrifice, one last fight...one last failure. And then the Oracle appeared and...well. You know the rest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000110_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ich kämpfte gegen dich<var 1D /var>... und verlor. Wenn das Orakel sich nicht auf unsere Seite gestellt hätte, wäre diese Welt für immer verloren gewesen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000120_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>There were times in the years and decades that followed when I wondered if we might not've been better off just letting the Rejoining happen.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000120_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Doch war die Errettung es wert? Wäre ein Neuanfang in einer vereinigten Welt nicht besser gewesen, als das Elend hier zu wahren? Diese Frage habe ich mir lange gestellt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000130_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>That we'd made one last mistake...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000130_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Aber dann<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000140_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>But seeing that giant Talos stir to life cured me of any doubts I still had.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000140_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Als ich auf Kholusia sah, wie der Talos sich erhob, da wusste ich es. Dies ist der richtige Weg.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000150_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Always. Always we took the burden of fighting upon ourselves. That's what heroes do, isn't it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000150_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Wir sind Helden. Wir müssen bis zuletzt kämpfen. Nicht für uns, sondern für alle anderen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000160_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>So we never had the chance to see anything like that─our people, coming together as one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000160_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Wenn wir unsere Arbeit tun, dann bauen sie diese Welt wieder auf, mit vereinten Kräften.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000170_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>To think that their hope still burned so bright...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000170_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>War es das gleißende Licht, das mein Herz blendete?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000180_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>...That they were still so eager to live, they would lift up their fellows, one on top of the other, till they reached the sky.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000180_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Sie wollen hier leben. Deswegen vollbringen sie das Unmögliche und errichten Wege, die bis in den Himmel reichen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000190_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>No, we made the right decision. And I can finally feel proud of the part we played in helping this world survive.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000190_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Endlich habe ich etwas, auf das ich stolz sein kann.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000200_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Well? Come on, then!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000200_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Komm schon! Lass mich nicht hängen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000210_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>As I thought. What happened between us was no coincidence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000210_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Dachte ich es mir doch. Dies ist kein Zufall.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000220_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>My story may be finished, but the fates have gifted me a minor role in yours.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000220_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Meine Geschichte ist bereits geschrieben, aber aus irgendeinem Grund spiele ich in deiner noch eine Rolle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000230_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>I suspected as much the moment I realized you could hear me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000230_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ich hatte es schon vermutet, als ich merkte, dass du mich sehen und hören kannst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000240_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>But it's hard not to doubt yourself when you're the man who caused the Flood...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000240_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Aber es ist, wie es ist: Ich bin der Narr, der die Lichtflut auslöste. Ich traue mir selbst nicht mehr über den Weg.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000250_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>I was afraid to do anything more than watch for fear of making things even worse...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000250_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Es war gut möglich, dass ich wieder falsch lag. Das ist einer der Gründe, warum es mir so schwerfiel, nach vorne zu blicken.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000260_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>...But no longer. After all, the path I once walked is now yours to finish.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000260_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Aber jetzt habt ihr mir gezeigt, dass unser Weg doch nicht so falsch war. Deswegen möchte ich jetzt etwas versprechen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000270_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>For what it's worth, I cast my lot with yours.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000270_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ich verschreibe dir meine Seele. So kann ich noch etwas Gutes tun, auch wenn es nur ein kleines bisschen ist.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000280_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>If you need a push, I'll be right there behind you; if you lose control, I'll do my best to stop you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000280_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Wenn du zu einer Gefahr für diese Welt wirst, werde ich dich auf den rechten Pfad lenken.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000290_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>So─let us be about it, <var 1A 02 /var>hero<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000290_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Also sieh zu, dass du nicht davon abweichst. <var 08 E905 ((Heldin)) ((Held)) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000300_FEOUL<tab>I was worried you were up here all alone, brooding and fretting and wallowing in your woes. But look at you─grinning at nothing like a pollen-drunk pixie!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000300_FEOUL<tab>Was seh ich denn da? Ich hab mir Sorgen um dich gemacht, und jetzt find ich mein Bäumchen hier alleine, mit einem Lachen auf dem Gesicht. Manchmal weiß ich wirklich nicht, was ich von dir halten soll.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000310_FEOUL<tab>Hmph! Look at what you've done to your aether! It's a mess! And you have cracks running all through that pretty soul of yours!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000310_FEOUL<tab>Hach, was siehst du fürchterlich aus! Dein Äther ist ja vollkommen durcheinander! Und deine Seele erst, voller geflickter Risse und gestopfter Löcher!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000320_FEOUL<tab>My poor little sapling. Whatever am I to do with you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000320_FEOUL<tab>Mein armes Bäumchen, so kann das doch nicht weitergehen. Was machen wir denn bloß mit dir?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000330_FEOUL<tab>Shall I yield up my throne? You could claim it─cut ties with the mortal world, hide away in the castle...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000330_FEOUL<tab>Warum wirst <var 1A 02 /var>du<var 1A 01 /var> nicht einfach der Feenkönig? Dann kannst du dich von der Welt verabschieden und es dir im Schloss gemütlich machen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000340_FEOUL<tab>It won't fix the problem...but would it really matter? If any pesky heroes come calling with steel and magic, all of Il Mheg will rise up in your defense.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000340_FEOUL<tab>Wenn jemand kommt, um dir das Leben schwer zu machen, ist ganz Il Mheg zur Stelle, um dich zu beschützen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000350_FEOUL<tab>My crown and scepter are yours...if you want them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000350_FEOUL<tab>Damit wären zwar nicht alle Probleme gelöst, aber das Angebot steht. Wie wär's? Soll ich dir Krone und Zepter reichen? Hm?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000360_FEOUL<tab>What? Don't give me that look! Of course I knew before I asked that you'd never ever heed such a <var 1A 02 /var>wicked<var 1A 01 /var> suggestion!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000360_FEOUL<tab>Was denn? Warum denn so kaltherzig! Du könntest doch wenigstens mal über mein Angebot nachdenken.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000370_FEOUL<tab>And besides, what would become of my precious and ephemeral flower?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000370_FEOUL<tab>Aber<var 1D /var>... was wird dann aus dir werden? Ich habe dir so wenig zu bieten<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000380_FEOUL<tab>My dear, beloved sapling. You are lost─confused─and have precious little time to gather your wits.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000380_FEOUL<tab>Mein liebes Bäumchen, mein süßes Bäumchen. Du befindest dich gerade in einem Irrgarten. Du weißt nicht, wo du langgehen sollst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000390_FEOUL<tab>Your kind is always so preoccupied with what lies ahead, and so we muddle your vision with fog and glamour. But such trickery is easy to see through.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000390_FEOUL<tab>Gefundenes Fressen für Wesen wie mich, die die Sterblichen mit Nebel und falschen Wegweisern immer tiefer in die Irre führen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000400_FEOUL<tab>Stand very, very still. Think not of where you need to go, but where you are right now at this moment. At this time, in this place...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000400_FEOUL<tab>Ich sage dir was: Bleib stehen. Überlege nicht, um welche Ecke du gehen musst. Überlege zuerst, wo du bist. Dann findest du den Weg heraus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000410_FEOUL<tab>Our [friend] of crystal. From shadowed hood he watched you go, his ruby eyes with warmth aglow.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000410_FEOUL♪ Unser Freund, aus Kristall klar ♪
♪ Sein rotes Aug' behütet dich ♪

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000420_FEOUL<tab>See yourself as he saw you, and that shall be the clearest clue.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000420_FEOUL♪ Erkenn dich selbst, wie er dich sah ♪
♪ Und wo du stehst, enthüllt sich ♪

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000430_FEOUL<tab>You stand in his garden, dear sapling. Ask his flowers what they know, and you will surely find an answer.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000430_FEOUL<tab>Dies ist sein Garten. Wenn du mit seinen Bewohnern sprichst, wird sich das Dickicht etwas lichten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000440_FEOUL<tab>But what will you do with it, I wonder...? I'll be watching and waiting, waiting and watching!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000440_FEOUL<tab>Ich bin schon gespannt, wie du dich entscheidest. Wir werden uns wiedersehen<var 1D /var>- ich kann es nicht erwarten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000450_LYNA<tab>I have unlocked the door to the Umbilicus. You are free to enter.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000450_LYNA<tab>Ich habe den Umbilicus für dich geöffnet. Du kannst eintreten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000460_LYNA<tab>Once you have what you require, I'll see it sealed once more. Until then, I will remain without.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000460_LYNA<tab>Ich werde auf dich warten. Lass mich wissen, wenn du fertig bist, damit ich die Tür wieder verschließen kann.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000470_URIANGER<tab>A moment to collect my thoughts, I prithee...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000470_URIANGER<tab>Also, Kristall<var 16 /var>exarch<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000480_URIANGER<tab>Thy true name is G'raha Tia, then.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000480_URIANGER<tab>Nein<var 1D /var>... dein richtiger Name war ja G'raha Tia.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000490_URIANGER<tab>By thy claims, thou too art a native of the Source, though from an age beyond our own, when the Eighth Umbral Calamity hath visited devastation upon our star.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000490_URIANGER<tab>Du bist also nicht von hier, sondern aus der Ursprungs<var 16 /var>welt. Und du behauptest, aus einer Zukunft zu kommen, in der die Achte Katastrophe eingetreten ist?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000500_URIANGER<tab>Thou hast, by subtle means, reached across the boundaries of time and space to unsow the seeds of catastrophe, ere its creeping vines drag our champion unto an early grave...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000500_URIANGER<tab>Du hast die Grenzen von <var 08 E905 ((Zeit und Raum)) ((Raum und Zeit)) /var> überquert, um die Auslöser der Katastrophe zu beseitigen und so <var 08 E905 ((die Heldin)) ((den Helden)) /var> vor dem Tod zu retten?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000510_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>In essence, yes. A difficult story to swallow, I am sure...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000510_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>So und nicht anders ist es. Auch wenn es dir noch etwas unglaubwürdig erscheinen mag.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000520_URIANGER<tab>(SIGH)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000520_URIANGER<tab>Ha<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000530_URIANGER<tab>I doubt not the veracity of thy words─not the account of thy coming, nor that of the fated Calamity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000530_URIANGER<tab>Nein, ich bezweifle es nicht. Weder was die Katastrophe betrifft, noch was du über dich selbst gesagt hast.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000540_URIANGER<tab>Yet my mind straineth still to apprehend the enormity of this tale. Wouldst thou favor me with a gradual unfolding of its chapters?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000540_URIANGER<tab>Aber es gibt viel zu bedenken. Dürfte ich dich bitten, mir zu erzählen, wie es zu all dem kommen wird?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000550_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Certainly.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000550_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Selbstverständlich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000551_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But where to begin? I should start with those great minds who survived the Calamity─Cid Garlond being perhaps the greatest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000551_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Wo soll ich anfangen? Ja<var 1D /var>... Am besten mit Cid Garlond. Er und eine Handvoll seiner Leute haben die Achte Katastrophe überlebt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000560_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>In hopes of staying the unending tides of war, he and his fellows pursued all manner of possible solutions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000560_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Sie suchten fieberhaft nach einem Weg, dem nicht enden wollenden Krieg Einhalt zu gebieten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000570_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>One of these was rooted in a theory which unified several fundamental principles discovered over the course of the Warrior of Light's adventures.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000570_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Während eines Abenteuers mit <var 08 E905 ((der Heldin)) ((dem Helden)) /var> kamen sie auf eine Idee, die sie unter Einsatz ihres Lebens verfolgten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000580_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>It proposed a method by which one could enter the river of time, traverse the rift, and leap between worlds.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000580_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Es galt, den Fluss der Zeit umzukehren und<var 1D /var>- quer durch den Inter<var 16 /var>dimen<var 16 /var>sio<var 16 /var>nalen Riss<var 1D /var>- zwischen den Welten zu springen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000590_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Perfecting that idea, however, was a work which consumed their lifetimes. And thus was it left to future generations to decide whether theory would be put into practice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000590_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Doch sie waren alt und ihr Ende nahte. Sie beschlossen, es der nächsten Generation zu überlassen, ob der Plan in die Tat umgesetzt werden sollte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000600_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But all the while the world continued to burn. Hope was a feeble outpost, beset on all sides by thievery and misery and murder.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000600_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Dies geschah zu einer Zeit, in der der Krieg noch immer wütete. Die Völker beraubten und mordeten sich gegenseitig, und es gab keine Anzeichen für Hoffnung.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000610_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>People cried out in despair, “There is no hope. We are finished. <var 1A 02 /var>Mankind<var 1A 01 /var> is finished.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000610_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Man hielt die Welt für verloren. Die Völker hätten ihre Zukunft verraten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000620_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Then others raised their voices in answer.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000620_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Doch dann geschah es.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000630_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>"Though we be beyond salvation, those who came before may yet be saved.“
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000630_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Endlich sagte jemand: Es ist genug. Ich bin nicht in diese Welt gekommen, um die alten Kämpfe fortzuführen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000640_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>"We will forge a crossroads, and pave the way for a different future. By the wisdom of our forebears we will prevent this Calamity from ever having come to pass.“
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000640_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich bin hier, um eine neue Welt zu schaffen. Ich werde das Wissen nutzen, das die Weisen uns hinterließen, und die Katastrophe aufhalten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000650_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The fighting went on unabated, but some few took up Cid's research, and labored to realize those impossible ideas.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000650_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Diejenigen, die der gleichen Ansicht waren, machten sich daran, Cids Plan in die Tat umzusetzen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000660_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>After two centuries of labor, their descendants finally succeeded in awakening the Crystal Tower─an integral part of the process─and in doing so roused its caretaker. Me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000660_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Erst zweihundert Jahre nach Ausbruch der Katastrophe gelang es, den Kristallturm in Gang zu setzen. Und damit erwachte auch ich, der Hüter des Turms.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000670_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>By this stage, scholars had largely established the phenomena underpinning the Rejoining, and identified the First as the shard which precipitated the Eighth Umbral Calamity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000670_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Zu diesem Zeitpunkt waren die Auslöser der Katastrophe und die Vereinigung mit der ersten Splitter<var 16 /var>welt bereits gut erforscht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000680_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>This grand structure was already capable of storing the energies required to attempt the translocation. All that remained was to augment some few of its functions, based upon the theoretical models of Cid and his compeers.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000680_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Also wurde der Turm nach Cids Plänen umgebaut und mit der erforderlichen Energie gespeist.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000690_URIANGER<tab>And by means of such technologies didst thou effect thine arrival in the First, to an age before this star had joined with the Source.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000690_URIANGER<tab>Du hast den Turm in die erste Splitter<var 16 /var>welt versetzt, in eine Zeit vor der Vereinigung der Welten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000700_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Some while before, as it turned out. 'Tis all but impossible to predict how time will flow between one world and the next, and we missed our mark by almost an entire century.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000700_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich wollte kurz vor der Verschmelzung eintreffen, doch ich schoss um knapp einhundert Jahre über mein Ziel hinaus. Die unter<var 16 /var>schied<var 16 /var>lichen Zeitflüsse zwischen den Welten sind wirklich äußerst schwierig zu berechnen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000710_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But this only worked in our favor. The sin eaters could not be defeated without the blessing of Light, and summoning the only man who might stand a chance against them would require decades of preparation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000710_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Doch das erwies sich als unerwarteter Glücksfall. Schließlich brauchte ich Zeit, um ihn zu rufen. Ihn, ohne dessen Gabe des Lichts die Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger nicht zu besiegen waren.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000720_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But this only worked in our favor. The sin eaters could not be defeated without the blessing of Light, and summoning the only woman who might stand a chance against them would require decades of preparation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000720_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Doch das erwies sich als unerwarteter Glücksfall. Schließlich brauchte ich Zeit, um sie zu rufen. Sie, ohne deren Gabe des Lichts die Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger nicht zu besiegen waren.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000730_URIANGER<tab>...An undertaking of scarce credible endurance. That thou hast kept thy plan from falling into disarray these many years bordereth on the miraculous.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000730_URIANGER<tab>Ein außer<var 16 /var>ge<var 16 /var>wöhn<var 16 /var>lich durchdachtes Spiel<var 1D /var>... Es grenzt an ein Wunder, dass du es Zug um Zug in die Tat umsetzen konntest.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000740_URIANGER<tab>Yet howsoever history be rewritten, thy present self was shaped by events which followed the Calamity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000740_URIANGER<tab>Doch wenn du die Geschichte umschreibst<var 1D /var>... Dein gegenwärtiges Ich wurde zum Teil in der Zeit nach dem Eintritt der Katastrophe geformt und bleibt mit ihr verbunden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000750_URIANGER<tab>Should said catastrophe be averted, the very skein of thine existence will unravel. Surely thou hast foreseen this...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000750_URIANGER<tab>Wenn dieselbe nicht eintritt<var 1D /var>... werden die Fäden deiner Existenz auseinandergezogen und neu geknüpft. Das muss dir doch bewusst sein?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000760_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I am aware of the consequences. 'Tis for that very reason Cid and his colleagues bequeathed their legacy as an offering...and not an edict.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000760_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ja, das ist mir natürlich klar. Deswegen hat Cid die Entscheidung auch allein demjenigen überlassen, der den Plan ausführen würde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000770_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>To give all of oneself for the happiness of others, and with no promise of reward? 'Tis a hard thing to ask.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000770_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Sein Leben ganz einer Sache zu widmen, ohne Eigennutz und nur zum Wohle anderer, ist keine leichte Angelegenheit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000780_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Harder still for those condemned to survive in a world which pitted brother against brother. Indeed, you were right to call the execution of this plan “miraculous”─though the force which held it together was nothing so inexplicable.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000780_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Besonders in einer Welt voller Zwietracht, die dem Krieg verfallen war. Aber es gibt einen Grund, warum ich es tue.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000790_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>It was him. The Warrior of Light has been our unbroken thread.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000790_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Er, der Held. Wir alle sind durch seine Geschichten verbunden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000800_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>It was her. The Warrior of Light has been our unbroken thread.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000800_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Sie, die Heldin. Wir alle sind durch ihre Geschichten verbunden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000810_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Where others would stumble and fall, <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> would rise above. Where others would break and run, <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> would carry on.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000810_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Egal, wie aussichtslos der Kampf war, immer hat jemand das Banner hochgehalten. Egal, wie hoffnungslos die Reise schien, jemand hat immer ein neues Lied angestimmt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000820_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The Warrior of Light's tale is one of unyielding bravery. To tell it was to feel courage; to hear it was to feel hope. It was a breath of inspiration in an age of suffocating shadow.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000820_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Denn sie haben Erzählungen von <var 08 E905 ((ihren)) ((seinen)) /var> Heldentaten gehört und darin den Mut gefunden, weiterzumachen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000830_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>In the histories of a fallen nation was our hero hailed as its greatest ally.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000830_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Sie stehen in den Annalen der Geschichtsschreiber, die von befreiten Ländern und neuen Allianzen berichten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000840_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>In the timeworn pages of a noble's memoirs were <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> deeds joyously retold.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000840_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Sie stehen in abgegriffenen Chroniken, wieder und wieder kopiert und weitergereicht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000850_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>For many, these stories were the flame which warmed them through the coldest of nights.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000850_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Sie wandern von Mund zu Ohr, vorgetragen in Liedern und Gedichten, um die Geister der Nacht zu vertreiben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000860_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And so it should come as little surprise that the plan found no shortage of volunteers, concerning as it did the Warrior of Light <var 08 E905 ((herself)) ((himself)) /var>. It was their chance to add their own verse to the hero's saga.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000860_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Auch diejenigen, die gegen die Katastrophe kämpften, waren von ihnen inspiriert.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000870_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>He was the lodestar that brought them all together, to send their final message back through time and space...to him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000870_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Sie schauten zu ihm auf, wie zu einem fernen Stern, dem man seine Wünsche schickt. Ich weiß, was sie ihm sagen würden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000880_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>She was the lodestar that brought them all together, to send their final message back through time and space...to her.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000880_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Sie schauten zu ihr auf, wie zu einem fernen Stern, dem man seine Wünsche ausspricht. Ich weiß, was sie ihr sagen würden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000890_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>"The light of your legacy was our torch in the darkness. Burn bright again...and live.“
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000890_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Dein Tod war nicht umsonst. Durch dich lebt unsere Hoffnung. Wir werden dich nie vergessen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000900_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I am merely the bearer of that wish, come to ensure it is safely delivered.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000900_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich bin nur ein Bote, ein Handlanger. Ich führe einen Plan aus, der <var 08 E905 ((ihr das)) ((ihm sein)) /var> Leben zurückgeben soll.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000910_URIANGER<tab>Wherefore sharest thou this burden with me and no other? What wouldst thou have me say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000910_URIANGER<tab>Warum erzählst du mir das?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000920_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>That you will be my accomplice?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000920_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Auch dafür gibt es einen Grund. Ich möchte, dass du zu meinem Komplizen wirst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000930_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>'Twas you yourself who convinced me of your suitability when you spoke of how you learned of the Flood, and of your part in arranging Minfilia's journey to the First.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000930_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Du selbst hast dich für diese Rolle empfohlen, als du mir verrietst, wie du von der Flut erfuhrst und Minfilias Reise in die erste Splitter<var 16 /var>welt in die Wege leitetest.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000940_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Your actions showed uncommon resolve. 'Twas clear you were committed to the cause of saving this world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000940_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Du bist ein scharfsinniger Denker und entschlossen, diese Welt zu retten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000950_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I knew I could trust you to choose the right path forward...even if that choice came with a heavy price.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000950_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Dir kann ich vertrauen. Du wirst es verstehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000960_URIANGER<tab>...What price?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000960_URIANGER<tab>Was verstehen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000970_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>When all is said and done, and the last of the Lightwardens lies slain, I will absorb their corrupted aether. And then I will die.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000970_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Wenn der Plan vollzogen und der letzte Licht<var 16 /var>bringer besiegt ist, werde ich das Licht in mich aufnehmen und sterben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000980_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Knowing what I know of your companions─not to mention your champion─they will try to stop me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000980_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Irgendjemand wird versuchen, mich davon abzuhalten. Einer deiner Freunde oder, wahrscheinlicher, <var 08 E905 ((die Heldin)) ((der Held)) /var> selbst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000990_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But in saving one they would save none.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_000990_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Aber dazu darf es nicht kommen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001000_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Therefore I implore you to aid me in concealing my identity, and ensuring this tale ends as it must.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001000_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Du musst mir helfen, meine wahre Identität und meine Absichten zu verbergen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001010_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>To this end, I would have you take what I have told you of the Calamity and make of it a portent─a prophetic vision you beheld in the swirling chaos of the rift.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001010_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Urianger. Du hast das Wissen um die Achte Katastrophe nicht von mir. Du hast es im Riss zwischen den Dimensionen gesehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001020_URIANGER<tab>...Is this truly thy wish?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001020_URIANGER<tab>Hältst du das wirklich für das Beste?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001030_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>History remembered the Warrior of Light, as I knew it would. And I will suffer no other to rescue the champion whose star has charted my course.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001030_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Als ich in der Zukunft erwachte, hörte ich die Barden <var 08 E905 ((ihren)) ((seinen)) /var> Namen singen. Da war mein Schicksal besiegelt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001040_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>At this point in time, I yet travel with the Warrior of Light in Eorzea. And I would not have matters here interfere with that of all episodes in my life.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001040_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Mein Ich in der Ursprungs<var 16 /var>welt und <var 08 E905 ((sie)) ((er)) /var> haben noch ein Abenteuer zu erleben. Ich wäre untröstlich, wenn es nicht zu einem guten Abschluss finden würde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001050_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>At this point in time, the Warrior of Light and I have yet to meet in Eorzea. And I would not wish that meeting soured by events which happen here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001050_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Mein Ich in der Ursprungs<var 16 /var>welt und <var 08 E905 ((sie)) ((er)) /var> haben sich noch nicht einmal getroffen. Ich wäre untröstlich, wenn es nie zu dieser Episode kommen würde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001060_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I will see this tale to a happy end, my friend. There has been enough tragedy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001060_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Glaub mir, ich habe genug Zeit gehabt, um über alles nachzudenken. Mein Entschluss steht fest: Ich werde <var 08 E905 ((sie)) ((ihn)) /var> retten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001070_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Careful, now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001070_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Du musst auf dich Acht geben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001080_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>If you lose control again, the Light could claim you for good.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001080_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Wenn das Licht wieder außer Kontrolle gerät, könnte es das letzte Mal sein. Es wird dich verwandeln.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001090_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Although it's probably only a matter of time before you succumb to the change, in any case.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001090_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Es dürfte ohnehin nur eine Frage der Zeit sein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001100_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>What do you mean to do?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001100_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Was wirst du tun?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I mean to hunt down Emet-Selch.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ich werde Emet-Selch und seinen wahnsinnigen Plan aufhalten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I mean to rescue the Exarch.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ich werde versuchen, den Kristall<var 16 /var>exarchen zu retten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>I mean to have a few words...with both Emet and the Exarch.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Sowohl Emet-Selch als auch der Kristall<var 16 /var>exarch schulden mir eine Erklärung.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001110_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(AMUSED HEH)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001110_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Hm ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001120_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Then we should be on our way. The Ascian mentioned the Tempest, did he not?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001120_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Dann haben wir keine Zeit zu verlieren. Emet-Selch erwähnte doch etwas von stürmischen Wogen, oder?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001130_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>That's “the stormy seas around Kholusia” to you. His lair must be down there somewhere, hidden beneath the waves.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001130_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Kholusia liegt im Meer der Schwarzen Winde. Bestimmt hat er dort im Meer seinen Unterschlupf.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001140_URIANGER<tab>Ah, we have found thee.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001140_URIANGER<tab>Hier bist du also.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001150_URIANGER<tab>Word reached us of thy recovery, and thus did we gather with all haste.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001150_URIANGER<tab>Als wir hörten, dass du aufgewacht bist, sind wir alle so schnell gekommen wie möglich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001160_URIANGER<tab>Ah. By thy looks, I gather thou hast gleaned that which I came to tell thee.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001160_URIANGER<tab>Dein Blick verrät mir, dass du die Wahrheit bereits kennst. Du hast sie in der Ver<var 16 /var>gangen<var 16 /var>heit gesehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001170_ALPHINAUD<tab>Urianger has shared everything with us─the Exarch's true identity and purpose.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001170_ALPHINAUD<tab>Urianger hat es uns erzählt. Wer der Kristall<var 16 /var>exarch ist und was er vorhat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001180_URIANGER<tab>I offer no excuses.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001180_URIANGER<tab>Es gibt keine Rechtfertigung dafür, dass ich die Wahrheit verschwiegen habe.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001190_URIANGER<tab>When I agreed to aid the Exarch with his plans, 'twas in full acceptance of the condemnation I would face when my duplicity was laid bare.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001190_URIANGER<tab>Ich wusste, dass du irgendwann den ganzen Plan des Kristall<var 16 /var>exarchen erfahren würdest. Und ich war bereit, die Konsequenzen zu tragen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001200_URIANGER<tab>...Yet it is not rancor but resolve that I sense in thee. Thou art fully intent upon walking thy path to its end, art thou not?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001200_URIANGER<tab>Das bin ich immer noch. Du kannst über mich urteilen, wie dir beliebt. Doch ich habe eine Bitte an dich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001210_URIANGER<tab>If thou canst forgive my deception─or, failing that, set aside thy displeasure for a time─I do beg leave to follow thee. What strength and wisdom I possess are thine to command.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001210_URIANGER<tab>Lass mich mit dir gehen. Ich möchte dir mit meinem Wissen helfen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I forgive you. Let's go.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Also gut, wir gehen zusammen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I am a danger to those around me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ich bin eine Gefahr.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A3_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>No more lies.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A3_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Wehe, du verbirgst wieder etwas vor mir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001220_URIANGER<tab>...I thank thee. Doubt not but that I will do all in my power to repay thy kindness, and fulfill the Exarch's wishes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001220_URIANGER<tab>Ich verneige mich vor deiner Gutmütigkeit. Ich werde alles tun, damit du deine Entscheidung nicht bereust.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001230_URIANGER<tab>I understand the precarious nature of thy condition. Nonetheless, it is my wish to remain at thy side for as long as I am able.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001230_URIANGER<tab>Ich weiß, wie es um dich steht. Aber dennoch<var 1D /var>... Solange mich meine Füße tragen, werde ich an deiner Seite stehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001240_URIANGER<tab>Pray believe me when I say that I took no pleasure in deceiving thee. Indeed, I curse the circumstances which compelled me to do so... But no further secrets lie between us, I swear it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001240_URIANGER<tab>Ich verstehe. Ich werde deine warnenden Worte nicht vergessen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001250_RYNE<tab>I'm sorry but...I don't think this is a good idea.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001250_RYNE<tab>Ich bin dagegen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001260_RYNE<tab>Leaving the Crystarium, I mean─with or without Urianger.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001260_RYNE<tab>Nicht, dass Urianger dich begleitet. Sondern dass du gehst. Ich habe Angst um dich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001270_RYNE<tab>What I did for you won't last forever. There's no telling when the Light will break free again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001270_RYNE<tab>Ich habe nur das Allernötigste getan. Das Licht kann jederzeit wieder außer Kontrolle geraten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001280_RYNE<tab>Please, you must stay here, at least for a little while longer! We will find a way to cure this, I promise you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001280_RYNE<tab>Du musst dich noch schonen. Wenn wir uns anstrengen, finden wir bestimmt etwas, das dir hilft.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001290_ALISAIE<tab>How can you make promises!? We don't even know where to start!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001290_ALISAIE<tab>„Wenn wir uns anstrengen?“ Was sollen wir denn noch machen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001300_ALPHINAUD<tab>Alisaie, please. You know Ryne was only trying to help.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001300_ALPHINAUD<tab>Alisaie ... Ryne will doch nur<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001310_ALISAIE<tab>Of course I know! I know only too well!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001310_ALISAIE<tab>Ich weiß, was sie will. Ich will es ja schließlich auch.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001320_ALISAIE<tab>But making promises you have no way of keeping is not a kindness─it's a lie, plain and simple!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001320_ALISAIE<tab>Aber was nützt ein Versprechen, wenn man es nicht halten kann?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001330_ALISAIE<tab>We've all searched high and low for an answer! And every one of us came back empty-handed!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001330_ALISAIE<tab>Wir haben wie besessen nach irgendeiner Heilung, einer Linderung gesucht<var 1D /var>... und nichts gefunden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001340_ALISAIE<tab>I am not about to stand in <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> way now─not after failing <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> in <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> hour of need! No, the least we can do is...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001340_ALISAIE<tab>Da bringt es doch nichts, jetzt wieder das Gleiche zu versprechen. Man<var 1D /var>... Man kann doch nicht<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001350_ALPHINAUD<tab>We will go with you, as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001350_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wir kommen auch mit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001360_ALPHINAUD<tab>There is naught to be gained by standing still.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001360_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wir können selbst etwas Trost vertragen, und den finden wir am ehesten, wenn wir uns zusammen auf den Weg machen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001370_YSHTOLA<tab>Indeed, we have exhausted every other avenue.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001370_YSHTOLA<tab>Ich habe auch keine Lust, einfach nur auf deine Rückkehr zu warten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001380_YSHTOLA<tab>Lead and we shall follow. If there <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> any hope to be found, then we will surely find it at your side.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001380_YSHTOLA<tab>Lass uns dich begleiten. Es wird schon etwas geben, wobei wir dir helfen können.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001390_THANCRED<tab>Are we <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> in agreement, then?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001390_THANCRED<tab>Einverstanden?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001400_CASSARD<tab>(-???-)Is there aught we can do to help?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001400_CASSARD<tab>(-???-)Können wir denn auch was für euch tun?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001410_KATLISS<tab>Though we may not know the whole story, we do know you're in for a fight.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001410_KATLISS<tab>Wir wissen zwar nicht genau, was ihr vorhabt, aber es ist was ziemlich Wichtiges, oder?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001420_KATLISS<tab>And while the Exarch's away, it falls to the rest of us to see the Warrior of Darkness is given a proper send-off!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001420_KATLISS<tab>Wenn wir irgendetwas tun können, um <var 08 E905 ((der werten Kriegerin)) ((dem werten Krieger)) /var> der Dunkelheit zu helfen, dann sagt es uns.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001430_ALPHINAUD<tab>You told them!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001430_ALPHINAUD<tab>Hast du ihnen etwa was erzählt?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001440_LYNA<tab>No! Well...not in so many words.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001440_LYNA<tab>Nein, von mir wissen sie nichts. Ganz bestimmt nicht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001450_GLYNARD<tab>Aye, we didn't need it spelled out for us. When the night sky appeared over whichever place you went to, it was harder <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> to put two and two together!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001450_GLYNARD<tab>Wir sind von allein daraufgekommen. Es war aber auch nicht schwer. Schließlich kam die Nacht immer genau da zurück, wo ihr gerade hingegangen wart.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001460_BRAGI<tab>From the moment I heard that you and the Exarch shared a homeland, I had my suspicions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001460_BRAGI<tab>Ich hab's mir von Anfang an gedacht. Schon als der erste von euch hier auftauchte, angeblich aus der Heimat des Kristall<var 16 /var>exarchen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001470_BRAGI<tab>Long had he been waiting for a certain someone to arrive...and I knew at once that it must be you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001470_BRAGI<tab>Er hat die ganze Zeit auf irgendjemanden gewartet. Und als du kamst, war er auf einmal wie verändert.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001480_CRYSTARIUMGATEKEEPER<tab>Exactly! When he went out to meet you, 'twas clear it was no ordinary visitor.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001480_CRYSTARIUMGATEKEEPER<tab>Mir ist's auch aufgefallen. Ich war dabei, als er dich am Tor abgeholt hat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001490_CRYSTARIUMGATEKEEPER<tab>That spring in his step spoke volumes. I could feel his excitement!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001490_CRYSTARIUMGATEKEEPER<tab>So aufgeregt hab ich ihn in meinem ganzen Leben noch nicht gesehen. Das war nicht normal!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001500_CRYSTARIUMWOMAN<tab>Me too!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001500_CRYSTARIUMWOMAN<tab>Ja, so war's!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001510_CRYSTARIUMMAN<tab>That's right!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001510_CRYSTARIUMMAN<tab>Genau!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001520_CRYSTARIUMOLDMAN<tab>Hear, hear!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001520_CRYSTARIUMOLDMAN<tab>Sicher doch!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001530_MOREN<tab>We do not fully understand where you or the Exarch hail from, or why you've all done so much to protect us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001530_MOREN<tab>Wir wissen nicht, woher ihr und der Kristall<var 16 /var>exarch kommt, oder warum ihr euch so für uns einsetzt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001540_MOREN<tab>But we are deeply grateful, nonetheless.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001540_MOREN<tab>Aber dankbar sind wir euch dafür auf jeden Fall.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001550_MOREN<tab>So if there is anything at all we might do to aid your journey, you need only name it. What would you have of us?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001550_MOREN<tab>Wir wollen auch unseren Teil beitragen. Also bitte: Wenn es etwas gibt, was wir tun können, sagt es uns.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001560_YSHTOLA<tab>You might have invited them to join us, were there not so many. But come, they are waiting. What is your will, O Warrior of Darkness?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001560_YSHTOLA<tab>Das wär ein ganz schöner Trupp, wenn wir die alle mitnehmen. Was denkst du, <var 08 E905 ((werte Kriegerin)) ((werter Krieger)) /var> der Dunkelheit?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Defend the Crystarium until we return!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Passt gut auf die Stadt auf. Sie soll prachtvoll strahlen, wenn wir mit dem Exarchen heimkehren.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Leave it to us─we'll see the Exarch home safe and sound!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ihr könnt schon mal ein Festmahl vorbereiten, denn der Kristall<var 16 /var>exarch ist bald wieder da.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A4_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Hope for the best, but prepare for the worst...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A4_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Beschützt die Stadt! Ich werde wiederkommen und zwar mit dem Kristall<var 16 /var>exarchen! Versprochen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001570_URIANGER<tab>[O great and serene Bismarck.]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001570_URIANGER<tab><var 48 F20243 /var><var 49 F20244 /var>Ich rufe dich, großer Bismarck!<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001580_BISMARCK<tab>(-Bismarck-)[Long has it been since my name was called.]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001580_BISMARCK<tab>(-Bismarck-)<var 48 F20243 /var><var 49 F20244 /var>Lang ist es her, dass man meinen Namen rief.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001590_BISMARCK<tab>(-Bismarck-)[Why do you wake me, little neighbor?]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001590_BISMARCK<tab>(-Bismarck-)<var 48 F20243 /var><var 49 F20244 /var>Warum weckst du mich, kleiner Nachbar?<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001600_URIANGER<tab>[To the bottom of the western sea we go. Pray lend us your back and your breath.]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001600_URIANGER<tab><var 48 F20243 /var><var 49 F20244 /var>Wir wollen auf den Grund des Meeres im Westen. Bitte, leih uns deinen Rücken und deinen Atem.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001610_BISMARCK<tab>(GRUMBLE)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001610_BISMARCK<tab>(-Bismarck-)Fu ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001620_BISMARCK<tab>(-Bismarck-)[This world is in twilight. I wait for the sun to set. I wish only to sleep.]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001620_BISMARCK<tab>(-Bismarck-)<var 48 F20243 /var><var 49 F20244 /var>Diese Welt liegt in der Dämmerung. Ich will nur noch ruhen.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001630_ALISAIE<tab>Oh dear. I don't need to speak Fae to know that didn't go well...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001630_ALISAIE<tab>Ich versteh die Sprache der Feenwesen nicht, aber es klingt nicht so, als wäre er einverstanden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I know what to do!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>So hilf uns doch, mein süßes Zweiglein!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>We need Feo Ul!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Feo-Ul! Wo steckst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001640_FEOUL<tab>(LAUGH)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001640_FEOUL<tab>Huhuuu!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001641_FEOUL<tab>My [adorable sapling]! You've learned to call me at last!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001641_FEOUL<tab>Hat es mein <var 48 F20243 /var><var 49 F20244 /var>Baum des Glanzes<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> also endlich gelernt, wie man um Hilfe ruft?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001650_FEOUL<tab>And where do you go? On a trip? A journey? I <var 1A 02 /var>knew<var 1A 01 /var> you wouldn't give up without a fight!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001650_FEOUL<tab>Ich hatte es mir ja schon gedacht, dass du weitermachst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001660_FEOUL<tab>Oh, my precious mortal. I shall help you in any way I can!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001660_FEOUL<tab>Du bist ja sooo putzig! Haaa! Ich kann einfach nicht anders, als dir zu helfen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001670_FEOUL<tab>[Sleepy Bismarck, you old pixie! These are my precious, precious saplings.]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001670_FEOUL<tab><var 48 F20243 /var><var 49 F20244 /var>Wach auf, Bismarck, du altes Feenwesen! Du sprichst mit meinem lieben, lieben Bäumchen!<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001680_FEOUL<tab>[Let their wish be the king's command.]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001680_FEOUL<tab><var 48 F20243 /var><var 49 F20244 /var>Was es sich wünscht, sei auch mein Wunsch.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001690_BISMARCK<tab>(GRUMBLE)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001690_BISMARCK<tab>(-Bismarck-)Fuuuu<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001700_BISMARCK<tab>(-Bismarck-)[What a rare thing to awaken to.]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001700_BISMARCK<tab>(-Bismarck-)<var 48 F20243 /var><var 49 F20244 /var>Was sehen meine müden Augen?<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001710_BISMARCK<tab>(-Bismarck-)[My beautiful king. If it be thy wish, then so shall it be done.]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001710_BISMARCK<tab>(-Bismarck-)<var 48 F20243 /var><var 49 F20244 /var>Unseren bezaubernden König. Dein Wunsch sei mir Befehl.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001720_FEOUL<tab>Be sure to scrub this one's teeth for him upon your return. It's only good manners.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001720_FEOUL<tab>Vergiss nicht, ihm später die Zähne mit Asche zu bürsten. Es gehört sich so.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001730_URIANGER<tab>It will be done, Your Majesty. Our deepest thanks for your timely intervention.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001730_URIANGER<tab>Selbstverständlich, Eure Hoheit. Ich danke dem König der Feen für sein beherztes Eingreifen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001740_FEOUL<tab>An agreement is reached, and your departure is at hand! You wingless ones best hold on tight!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001740_FEOUL<tab>Alles ist gesagt, alles ist bereit. Haltet euch gut fest, damit ihr nicht runterfallt!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001750_FEOUL<tab>May the blessings of the fae keep you safe, [shining souls]!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001750_FEOUL<tab>Das Glück der Feen soll euch begleiten. Auf bald, <var 48 F20243 /var><var 49 F20244 /var>ihr glänzenden Leben<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001760_BISMARCK<tab>(-Bismarck-)[To the western sea we go. Wrapped in my breath, I will see you to your destination, little neighbors.]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001760_BISMARCK<tab>(-Bismarck-)<var 48 F20243 /var><var 49 F20244 /var>Wir fliegen zum Westmeer, kleine Nachbarn. Sobald wir dort sind, werde ich euch in meinen Atem hüllen.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001770_IRVITHE<tab>And just like that, it's all gone back to the way it was...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001770_IRVITHE<tab>Haa<var 1D /var>... Jetzt ist alles wieder beim Alten<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001780_GRITHIL<tab>What was you expecting? Hundred years of honey and rainbows?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001780_GRITHIL<tab>He, was denkst du denn? Dass du auf einmal keine Kisten mehr zu schleppen brauchst?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001790_GRITHIL<tab>Seeing them Eulmore types wake up and smell the ashes was miracle enough for me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001790_GRITHIL<tab>Wenn du mich fragst, bin ich schon froh, wenn die fetten Säcke aus Eulmore uns 'ne Weile in Ruhe lassen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001800_IRVITHE<tab>Ah, but the magic in the air when that Ladder started moving...hah! And when that great hulking Talos rose up, <var 1A 02 /var>gods<var 1A 01 /var>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001800_IRVITHE<tab>He, hast du etwa schon vergessen, wie es war, als der Aufzug sich bewegte? Oder als der große Talos sich erhob?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001810_IRVITHE<tab>I could live a thousand years and never behold anything so amazing...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001810_IRVITHE<tab>So was erlebt man nicht alle Tage<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001820_GRITHIL<tab>What the─! Do you see that!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001820_GRITHIL<tab>Oh! Siehst du das?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001830_IRVITHE<tab>What a monster! Where did it even come from!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001830_IRVITHE<tab>Uuuoooh! Was war das? Da ist doch was ins Meer getaucht! Irgendwas<var 1D /var>... Aber<var 1D /var>... Was denn eigentlich?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001840_GRITHIL<tab>Uh, wha... Wh-Whoa there...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001840_GRITHIL<tab>Was ist denn<var 1D /var>... das?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001850_IRVITHE<tab>It's not stopping...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001850_IRVITHE<tab>Das sieht nicht gut aus!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001860_IRVITHE<tab>Run! <var 1A 02 /var>Run<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001860_IRVITHE<tab>Nichts wie weg hier!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001870_BISMARCK<tab>(-Bismarck-)[I have fulfilled my duty. I return now to the lake.]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001870_BISMARCK<tab>(-Bismarck-)<var 48 F20243 /var><var 49 F20244 /var>Da sind wir, wie versprochen. Ich werde nun zum See zurückkehren.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001880_BISMARCK<tab>(-Bismarck-)[I have not flown in an age. It was...pleasant. May your journey be a safe one, little neighbors.]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001880_BISMARCK<tab>(-Bismarck-)<var 48 F20243 /var><var 49 F20244 /var>Ich bin schon lange nicht mehr geflogen. Gute Reise noch, kleine Nachbarn!<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001890_RYNE<tab>Wow...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001890_RYNE<tab>Das ist ja<var 1D /var>... unglaublich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001900_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>The breath of Bismarck. See how it swells to form a dome beneath the waves...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001900_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Tief unter den Wogen hinterließ Bismarcks Atem eine gigantische Luftblase.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001910_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>The waters recede. The Tempest's floor is laid bare.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001910_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Freigelegt vom Wasser, der Ort der Entscheidung: Tempest.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001920_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>In defiance of the blinding sky, this place holds fast to its gloom.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001920_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Selbst das gleißende Licht des Himmels vermochte nicht, die Düsternis des Meeres zu vertreiben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001930_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>The last refuge of he who denies the Light with every fiber of his being.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001930_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Es war zu spüren, dass hier der zu finden war, der das Licht verabscheut.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001940_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>You stand at the precipice, hero. Journey unto the Heart of Darkness. Finish it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001940_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Wage dich in das Herz der Dunkelheit, das letzte Kapitel deines Abenteuers.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001950_READEROFONDO<tab>O stewards of the Ondo... We offer up our light in answer...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001950_READEROFONDO<tab>Fsssh<var 1D /var>... Kommt, Bessschützer der Ondo. Kommt in den Glanz unserer Lichter.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001960_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>That crystal you showed the artisan...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001960_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Der Kristall, den du dem Meister gezeigt hast<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001970_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Was it...? Did it belong to one of my friends?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001970_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Gehörte er meinen Freunden?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I thought you were always watching?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Warst du nicht dabei?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Miss that part, did you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Sag bloß, das hast du verpasst<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001980_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>I try to give you a <var 1A 02 /var>measure<var 1A 01 /var> of privacy... No one wants a spirit looking over their shoulder every moment of the day.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001980_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ob du es glaubst oder nicht, ich habe auch noch andere Dinge zu tun, als dir überallhin zu folgen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001990_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>So tell me, if you would. How did you come across that crystal?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_001990_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Sag, wie bist du an den Kristall gekommen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002000_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>It was Renda-Rae's, then...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002000_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Er gehörte also Renda-Rae<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002010_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>It was Nyelbert's, then...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002010_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Er gehörte also Nyelbert<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002020_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>It was Branden's, then...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002020_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Er gehörte also Branden<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002030_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>It was Lamitt's, then...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002030_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Er gehörte also Lamitt<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002040_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>I was right, then...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002040_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Dann hatte ich also Recht<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002050_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>I was right, then...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002050_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Dann hatte ich also Recht<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002060_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Strange that I should learn such things now, after they're long gone. They were fine friends, every one of them...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002060_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Dies nach all der Zeit zu erfahren<var 1D /var>... Sie waren gute Freunde, jeder von ihnen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002070_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>I didn't expect death to teach me so much.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002070_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Wer hätte gedacht, dass man nach seinem Tod noch so viel Neues erfährt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002080_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>About them, about Seto─about you. About the hope that hides at the heart of this world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002080_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Über dich. Über Seto. Darüber, wie viel Kampfgeist noch in dieser Welt steckt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002090_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>I've never been one for idle chitchat, but if by some miracle I could see them all again, I doubt I'd ever stop talking...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002090_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ich bin kein Freund langer Plaudereien, aber wenn ich meine Freunde durch irgendein Wunder noch einmal wiedersehen könnte<var 1D /var>... Wir hätten uns viel zu erzählen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002100_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>I'm grateful I got to bend your ear, at least. And just for that, I reckon I'll stick with you...to the very end.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002100_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Du hast mir viel gegeben. Ich verspreche, dass ich dich bis zum Schluss begleiten werde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002110_ALPHINAUD<tab>Apologies─we were a little late to the gathering.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002110_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wir haben es nicht rechtzeitig geschafft.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002120_YSHTOLA<tab>It seems we've succeeded in gaining their trust.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002120_YSHTOLA<tab>Es scheint, als hätten wir uns ihr Vertrauen verdient.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002130_THANCRED<tab>The delay wasn't exactly welcome, but at least our many hands made light work.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002130_THANCRED<tab>Sie haben es uns nicht leicht gemacht. Aber die Mühen haben sich gelohnt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002140_THANCRED<tab>And they seemed especially impressed with your contribution. Our hero, indeed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002140_THANCRED<tab>Letztendlich aber warst du es, <var 08 E905 ((die)) ((der)) /var> sie überzeugt hat. Mal wieder.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002150_ALPHINAUD<tab>Y'shtola was telling us those structures may date back to the age of the Ascians.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002150_ALPHINAUD<tab>Y'shtola sagt, dass die Gebäude wahrscheinlich aus der Zeit der Ascians stammen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002160_ALISAIE<tab>An Ascian homeland...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002160_ALISAIE<tab>Hier haben sie also gelebt<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002170_ALISAIE<tab>Despite his many protestations, I never quite believed Emet-Selch was telling the truth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002170_ALISAIE<tab>Als Emet-Selch uns von ihrer Ver<var 16 /var>gangen<var 16 /var>heit erzählt hat, konnte ich es mir gar nicht richtig vorstellen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002180_ALPHINAUD<tab>Nor I. But there is no denying the evidence before our eyes. Clearly, this was once a great city...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002180_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ich auch nicht. Es muss eine beeindruckende Stadt gewesen sein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002190_ALPHINAUD<tab>...A home they would see restored, no matter how many tens of thousands of years it takes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002190_ALPHINAUD<tab>Kein Wunder, dass sie sich nach ihrer Heimat sehnen. Auch nach so langer Zeit noch.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002200_ALISAIE<tab>It's a hollow dream, when you think about it. Even if they manage to rejoin all the worlds, they'll never bring back the ones who were lost.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002200_ALISAIE<tab>Diese Narren. Auch wenn man alle Welten miteinander vereint, die Toten kommen dadurch nicht zurück.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002210_ALISAIE<tab>But would I have done any different...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002210_ALISAIE<tab>Aber<var 1D /var>... vielleicht würde ich's genauso machen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002220_RYNE<tab>Are you...? How are you feeling?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002220_RYNE<tab>Wie geht es dir?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002230_YSHTOLA<tab>You have completed your devotions?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002230_YSHTOLA<tab>Ist das Gebet beendet?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002240_READEROFONDO<tab>Yesss... To the honored ancientsss have we offered up our prayers and our gratitude. You, too, have our thanks.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002240_READEROFONDO<tab>Ja. Wir haben den Alten unseren Dank und unseren Respekt gesandt. Euch danken wir auch. Fsssh<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002250_URIANGER<tab>Might we trouble thee then to tell us more of the illuminated land of which thou didst lately speak?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002250_URIANGER<tab>Würdest du uns dann mehr über den leuchtenden Ort erzählen, von dem du sprachst?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002260_READEROFONDO<tab>To the west of here lies a great trench. Some days ago, a light appeared in that endlesss darknesss.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002260_READEROFONDO<tab>Sssh<var 1D /var>... Westlich von hier ist ein großer Graben. Er lag immer in tiefer Dunkelheit, doch seit kurzem ssstrahlt ein Licht aus ihm empor.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002270_READEROFONDO<tab>Curiousss, we ventured closer...and discovered in the depths an entire city.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002270_READEROFONDO<tab>Wir schwammen, um uns die Quelle des Lichts anzusehen. Und fanden eine grossse Stadt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002280_READEROFONDO<tab>The buildings we spied were akin to our own everlasting abodes. Impossibly so.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002280_READEROFONDO<tab>Fsssh<var 1D /var>... Zu unserem Erstaunen sahen wir, dass die Häuser dort ausssehen wie die unseren.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002290_READEROFONDO<tab>We understood at once─the ancients had risen. There could be no doubt.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002290_READEROFONDO<tab>Wir verstanden sofort. Die Alten waren erwacht. Es gibt keinen Zweifel.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002300_READEROFONDO<tab>Taken with terror, we retreated to the Cupsss, and I decreed that none should enter the trench until such time as we received a sssign.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002300_READEROFONDO<tab>Psssh<var 1D /var>... Voller Schrecken kehrten wir zu den Becken zurück und ich befahl, dass sich niemand dem Graben zu nähern habe, bis wir ein Zeichen bekämen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002310_ALPHINAUD<tab>Might it still be possible to reach this city of the ancients?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002310_ALPHINAUD<tab>Können wir uns diesen Ort der Alten ansehen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002320_READEROFONDO<tab>Hm... With no water to drown you, a finless one could now travel there, yesss.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002320_READEROFONDO<tab>Ja. Jetzt, da das Wasser verdrängt ist, braucht es weder Kieme noch Flosse, um dorthin zu gelangen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002330_READEROFONDO<tab>I am convinced you are the sssign for which we have been waiting. My people will show you the way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002330_READEROFONDO<tab>Fsssh<var 1D /var>... Ihr seid das Zeichen, auf das wir gewartet haben. Wir werden euch den Weg weisen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002340_ALPHINAUD<tab>Shall we?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002340_ALPHINAUD<tab>Komm, das sehen wir uns an.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002350_ALISAIE<tab>By the gods!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002350_ALISAIE<tab>Was ist denn das?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002360_ALPHINAUD<tab>When the Ondo spoke of a city, I did not think they meant an actual city!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002360_ALPHINAUD<tab>Das ist die Stadt<var 1D /var>... Sie ist ja gewaltig!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002370_YSHTOLA<tab>Then...we are seeing the same view.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002370_YSHTOLA<tab>Dann<var 1D /var>... seht ihr sie also auch?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002380_YSHTOLA<tab>The remnants in the Ondo settlement were solid, material structures, but these...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002380_YSHTOLA<tab>Die Gebäude im Dorf der Ondo sind echte Ruinen. Doch diese Stadt ist anders<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002390_YSHTOLA<tab>Everything here pulses with aether. 'Tis an enchantment on a monumental scale!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002390_YSHTOLA<tab>Sie ist<var 1D /var>... eine Illusion.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002400_EMETSELCH<tab>This really is unacceptable. I gave you very specific instructions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002400_EMETSELCH<tab>Ich dachte, die Besuchszeiten wären für heute vorüber.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002410_ALPHINAUD<tab>Emet-Selch!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002410_ALPHINAUD<tab>Emet-Selch!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002420_EMETSELCH<tab>My invitation was for an abomination, ripe with the power to bring about the world's annihilation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002420_EMETSELCH<tab>Hatte ich mich missverständlich ausgedrückt? Meine Einladung galt eigentlich nur einem Ungeheuer, prall gefüllt mit der Kraft, die diese Welt in den Untergang reißt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002430_EMETSELCH<tab>Not this half-broken...thing. Whatever am I to do with you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002430_EMETSELCH<tab>Nicht dieses halbfertige Etwas. Was soll ich bloß mit dir anfangen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002440_EMETSELCH<tab>And I see you insist on keeping the same familiar company. Are you so lost without them?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002440_EMETSELCH<tab>Und warum hast du schon wieder diese Tölpel mitgebracht? Fühlst du dich einsam ohne sie?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002450_YSHTOLA<tab>It is not <var 1A 02 /var><var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var><var 1A 01 /var> who is lost without the familiar.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002450_YSHTOLA<tab>Bist du es nicht, der sich einsam fühlt?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002460_YSHTOLA<tab>Not content with remaking an entire city, you aim to fill it with the reconstituted souls of the dead.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002460_YSHTOLA<tab>Die Stadt alleine reicht dir nicht. Du musst auch noch diejenigen zurückbringen, die Zodiark geopfert wurden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002470_EMETSELCH<tab>I may have gotten a <var 1A 02 /var>little<var 1A 01 /var> carried away, in my attention to detail. Added a few unnecessary flourishes...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002470_EMETSELCH<tab>Es stimmt, ich habe mich hier und da in gewissen Einzelheiten verloren. Verleitet von der Nostalgie, keine Frage.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002480_EMETSELCH<tab>Weeell, there's no point trying to hide it. Yes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002480_EMETSELCH<tab>Aber die wirkliche Absicht hast du messerscharf auf den Punkt gebracht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002490_EMETSELCH<tab>Once the rejoining of worlds is complete, Zodiark will regain His full strength and shatter His prison.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002490_EMETSELCH<tab>Sobald alle Welten wieder miteinander vereint sind, wird Zodiark seine ursprüngliche Kraft zurückerhalten und seine Fesseln zerschmettern.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002500_EMETSELCH<tab>Then we shall offer up the Source's remaining inhabitants in sacrifice, that we might resurrect our brethren who died to bring Zodiark into existence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002500_EMETSELCH<tab>Dann werden wir die gesamte Bevölkerung der Ursprungwelt als Opfer darbieten, um unsere Brüder zu<var 16 /var>rück<var 16 /var>zu<var 16 /var>brin<var 16 /var>gen, die ihr Leben Zodiark schenkten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002510_EMETSELCH<tab>But what was it that <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> came here to do, exactly?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002510_EMETSELCH<tab>Und ihr? Warum seid ihr noch mal hier?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>We came here to stop you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Wir sind hier, um dich aufzuhalten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>We came here for the Exarch.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Gib uns den Kristall<var 16 /var>exarchen zurück!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002520_EMETSELCH<tab>Did you now? One last do-or-die attempt to foil my plans before your mind dissolves into madness?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002520_EMETSELCH<tab>Ach ja? Ein letzter, vernunftgetriebener Versuch also, bevor du deinen Verstand verlierst?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002530_EMETSELCH<tab>How very, very...heroic of you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002530_EMETSELCH<tab>Wie überaus heldenhaft. Und so sinnlos!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002540_EMETSELCH<tab>In every single age, there is always <var 1A 02 /var>someone<var 1A 01 /var> who wants to stand up to the evil Ascians.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002540_EMETSELCH<tab>In jedem Zeitalter meint irgendjemand, die Pläne der bösen, bösen Ascians durchkreuzen zu müssen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002550_EMETSELCH<tab>Always the same arrogance, the same insistence that the world belongs to them. As if theirs were the only rightful claim, theirs the only existence worthy of preservation!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002550_EMETSELCH<tab>Sie alle glauben, die Weisheit gepachtet zu haben. Sie kennen nichts als ihre eigene, selbst<var 16 /var>ge<var 16 /var>fäl<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>ge Gerechtigkeit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002560_EMETSELCH<tab>Well, you can't have him. The wisdom that man guards may open up new worlds of possibilities.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002560_EMETSELCH<tab>Nein, das werde ich nicht. Was er weiß, eröffnet uns bisher ungeahnte Möglichkeiten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002570_EMETSELCH<tab>He has unlocked the secrets of travel across the rift─and through time as well, it would seem. Quite an accomplishment for one of his “incomplete” nature.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002570_EMETSELCH<tab>Er hat nicht nur herausgefunden, wie man andere über den Riss herbeiruft. Mehr noch, er reist durch die Zeit. Eine erstaunliche Leistung für einen Unvollkommenen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002580_EMETSELCH<tab>I must explore the limits of his capabilities, and harness that power for the Ardor.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002580_EMETSELCH<tab>Ich werde mir dieses Wissen aneignen und zu einer neuen Kraft der Ascians machen. Dadurch werden die weiteren Vereinigungen zu einem Kinderspiel werden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002590_EMETSELCH<tab>Even now, after everything, you refuse to see reason.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002590_EMETSELCH<tab>Diese Gesichter<var 1D /var>... Ihr versteht ja wirklich gar nichts.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002600_EMETSELCH<tab>You think it unfair that you are subject to suffering? That your lives will be sacrificed for the ancients?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002600_EMETSELCH<tab>Ihr haltet euer Schicksal für ungerecht? Ihr findet es nicht „richtig“, dass ihr als Opfer herhalten sollt?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002610_EMETSELCH<tab>Look at me! I have lived a thousand <var 1A 02 /var>thousand<var 1A 01 /var> of your lives!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002610_EMETSELCH<tab>Seht mich an! Ich habe Tausende und Abertausende eurer Leben gelebt!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002620_EMETSELCH<tab>I have broken bread with you, fought with you, grown ill, grown old! Sired children and yes, welcomed death's sweet embrace.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002620_EMETSELCH<tab>Ich habe das Brot mit euch geteilt, mit euch gekämpft, habe Krankheiten erlitten und das Alter erfahren. Ich habe Kinder gezeugt und selbst den Tod habe ich durchlebt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002630_EMETSELCH<tab>For eons have I measured your worth and found you wanting! Too weak and feeble-minded to serve as stewards of any star!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002630_EMETSELCH<tab>Wieder und wieder habe ich euch beobachtet, geprüft, bewertet, aber es gab nur einen Schluss: Ihr seid zu einfältig und zu schwach, um den Planeten zu beschützen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002640_EMETSELCH<tab>Have your recent spats with Vauthry and his sin eaters taught you nothing?
