target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002640_EMETSELCH<tab>Ihr müsst es doch selbst gemerkt haben, in eurem Kampf gegen Vauthry und seine Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002650_EMETSELCH<tab>Have you not learned that your ignorance and frailty beget only endless misery?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002650_EMETSELCH<tab>Euer Unvermögen, euer Hochmut<var 1D /var>... sie führen zu nichts als Elend und noch mehr Elend!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002660_EMETSELCH<tab>How long do you mean to perpetuate this farce? How much more must I endure your bumbling interference?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002660_EMETSELCH<tab>Wie <var 1A 02 /var>lange<var 1A 01 /var> muss ich das noch ertragen? Wie oft wollt ihr mich noch mit euren lächerlichen Auftritten belästigen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002670_EMETSELCH<tab>Let us imagine that the laws of reality are again undone, and the world faces true annihilation. Do you honestly believe that half your number would sacrifice themselves to save the other?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002670_EMETSELCH<tab>Angenommen, euren Völkern drohte eine echte Apokalypse. Würde sich jemals die eine Hälfte von euch für die andere opfern?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002680_EMETSELCH<tab>Of course they wouldn't!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002680_EMETSELCH<tab>Niemals würde sie das!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002690_EMETSELCH<tab>And if <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> had witnessed history unfold as <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> have, you would reach the <var 1A 02 /var>same<var 1A 01 /var> conclusion!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002690_EMETSELCH<tab>Und hättet ihr gesehen, was ich sah, würdet ihr nicht das Gegenteil behaupten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002700_EMETSELCH<tab>You cannot be entrusted with our legacy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002700_EMETSELCH<tab>Ihr könnt unmöglich unser Vermächtnis antreten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002710_EMETSELCH<tab>I will bring back our brethren. Our friends. Our loved ones. The world belongs to us and us alone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002710_EMETSELCH<tab>Ich werde unsere Brüder, unsere Freunde und unsere Geliebten wieder zurückbringen. Denn die Welt gehört uns. Und nur uns allein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002720_ALPHINAUD<tab>Emet-Selch!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002720_ALPHINAUD<tab>Emet-Selch!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002730_ALPHINAUD<tab>We understand. Truly. But it makes no difference.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002730_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wir sind nicht so verschieden. Auch wenn du es nicht wahrhaben möchtest.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002740_ALPHINAUD<tab>The ones you love are in the past.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002740_ALPHINAUD<tab>Du stellst dich hinter diejenigen, die dir lieb und teuer sind. Genau wie wir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002750_ALPHINAUD<tab>While ours are here in the present.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002750_ALPHINAUD<tab>Nur dass die Unseren hier sind, in der Gegenwart.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002760_ALPHINAUD<tab>One day, we too will be ashes and dust, but not today. Our time is not yet finished.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002760_ALPHINAUD<tab>Eines Tages werden wir zu Staub zerfallen sein, aber der Tag ist noch nicht gekommen. Unsere Zeit ist noch nicht vorbei.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002770_ALPHINAUD<tab>We share your conviction...and that is why we will not abandon our course.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002770_ALPHINAUD<tab>Deshalb verspreche ich dir, dass wir unseren Kampf nicht aufgeben werden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002780_EMETSELCH<tab>You think us the same? You think your tattered soul of equal worth to those <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> lost?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002780_EMETSELCH<tab>Du glaubst, dass wir uns ähnlich sind? Du stellst deinesgleichen neben meine vollkommenen Brüder?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002790_EMETSELCH<tab>Then come─<var 1A 02 /var>earn<var 1A 01 /var> your place. Prove yourselves <var 1A 02 /var>worthy<var 1A 01 /var> to inherit this star.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002790_EMETSELCH<tab>Dann beweis es mir doch. Beweist mir, dass ihr dieses Sterns würdig seid.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002800_EMETSELCH<tab>Behold, the coming oblivion. 'Twas the end of our era, and the beginning of our great work.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002800_EMETSELCH<tab>Stellt euch der Apokalypse<var 1D /var>- die unsere Ära der Blüte in ein Dasein der Rachsucht stürzte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002810_EMETSELCH<tab>A fitting backdrop...for your final judgment.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002810_EMETSELCH<tab>Sie wird ein treffliches Bühnenbild für eure allerletzte Bewährungsprobe sein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002820_EMETSELCH<tab>I shall wait within, but do not spend too much time on your preparations. There's no telling how much longer the guest of honor will last.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002820_EMETSELCH<tab>Ich warte auf euch, aber lasst euch nicht zu viel Zeit. Wer weiß, wie lange unser Ehrengast noch durchhält?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002830_EMETSELCH<tab>Well, well, you prevailed...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002830_EMETSELCH<tab>Ihr habt ihn also tatsächlich bezwungen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002840_EMETSELCH<tab>Nevertheless!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002840_EMETSELCH<tab>Aber dennoch!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002841_ALPHINAUD<tab>(HIT REAX)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002841_ALPHINAUD<tab>Uuh!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002842_ALISAIE<tab>(HIT REAX)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002842_ALISAIE<tab>Aah!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002850_EMETSELCH<tab>Your performance was underwhelming, and I remain unconvinced of your worthiness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002850_EMETSELCH<tab>Der Kampf hat mich nicht überzeugt. Ihr seid nicht würdig.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002860_EMETSELCH<tab>Oh, you tower over your misbegotten ilk, no doubt. But should I bring my full strength to bear, well...you would be as leaves in the wind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002860_EMETSELCH<tab>Versteht mich nicht falsch, ihr seid viel besser als jeder andere Unvollkommene. Aber sollte ich einmal meine gesamte Kraft entfesseln, wärt ihr nichts als Blätter im Wind.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002870_EMETSELCH<tab>The gulf between us is a reflection of the disparity between the world as it was...and what it has become.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002870_EMETSELCH<tab>Er ist eben nicht zu übersehen<var 1D /var>- der Unterschied zwischen der Welt, wie sie einmal war, und was heute aus ihr geworden ist.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002880_ALISAIE<tab>Hah!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002880_ALISAIE<tab>Ha!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002890_ALISAIE<tab>(GRUNT)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002890_ALISAIE<tab>Hrgh<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002900_ALISAIE<tab>Our worlds may not live up to your lofty standards...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002900_ALISAIE<tab>Du magst vielleicht auf unsere Welten herabsehen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002910_ALISAIE<tab>But they are <var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> worlds! <var 1A 02 /var>Our<var 1A 01 /var> homes! Full of life and love and hope!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002910_ALISAIE<tab>... aber es sind immer noch unsere Welten! Sie sind unsere Heimat, voller Leben, Liebe und Hoffnung!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002920_ALISAIE<tab>And we won't stand by and let you destroy them!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002920_ALISAIE<tab>Und wir werden sie uns von niemandem nehmen lassen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002930_ALISAIE<tab>Ugh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002930_ALISAIE<tab>Uaaah!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002940_ALPHINAUD<tab>Alisaie!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002940_ALPHINAUD<tab>Alisaie!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002950_EMETSELCH<tab>You are a mistake.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002950_EMETSELCH<tab>Es ist sinnlos mit euch.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002960_EMETSELCH<tab>For we who have known perfection, the shattered Source and these shards are ghastly mockeries of the true world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002960_EMETSELCH<tab>Wenn man einmal die Perfektion der alten Welt gesehen hat, sind der Ursprung und seine Splitter nichts als blasse Abbilder einer vergangenen Pracht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002970_EMETSELCH<tab>The ephemeral lives you exalt are pale imitations, utterly devoid of meaning.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002970_EMETSELCH<tab>Eure Leben sind bedeutungslos, eure Träume nur fahrige Ideen, eure Schicksale führen ins Nichts.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002980_ALPHINAUD<tab>Belittle us all you like, but we will rise again and again, and give the lie to your insults through word and deed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002980_ALPHINAUD<tab>Du kannst über uns spotten, wie du willst, aber wir werden wieder und wieder aufstehen und deine Beleidigungen mit Taten und Worten Lügen strafen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002990_ALPHINAUD<tab><var 1A 02 /var>We<var 1A 01 /var> define our worth, not the circumstances of our creation!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_002990_ALPHINAUD<tab>Gleich, in welcher Gestalt wir geschaffen wurden, wir bestimmen selbst, wer wir sind und wie wir leben!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003000_EMETSELCH<tab>Hmph, more prattle.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003000_EMETSELCH<tab>Püh! Bla, bla, bla<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003010_EMETSELCH<tab>Fool. Who are you? No one. <var 1A 02 /var>Nothing<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003010_EMETSELCH<tab>Vergiss es. Du bist ein Niemand. Du bist nichts!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003020_EMETSELCH<tab>Once I have reclaimed my heritage, my first act will be to expunge your stain from history's weave.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003020_EMETSELCH<tab>Sobald ich dem Planeten seine reine Form wiedergegeben habe, werde ich dafür sorgen, dass du, dieser Schandfleck seiner Geschichte, vollkommen ausgelöscht wirst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003030_EMETSELCH<tab>My world will have no need for heroes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003030_EMETSELCH<tab>Es wird nie <var 08 E905 ((eine Heldin)) ((einen Helden)) /var> gegeben haben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003040_EMETSELCH<tab>Still fighting the good fight...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003040_EMETSELCH<tab>Erbärmlich<var 1D /var>... Wirklich erbärmlich<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003050_YSHTOLA<tab>It is true that all we hold dear is fated to fade away.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003050_YSHTOLA<tab>Es stimmt, dass wir irgendwann im Dunkel der Geschichte verschwinden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003060_YSHTOLA<tab>But that is no reason for us to forsake it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003060_YSHTOLA<tab>Aber so weit sind wir noch nicht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003070_URIANGER<tab>To take what steps we may, and thus mark the road for those who would follow.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003070_URIANGER<tab>Wir schreiten voran, auf dass andere in unsere Fußspuren treten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003080_URIANGER<tab>To strive for the best of all futures... Be this not also thy purpose!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003080_URIANGER<tab>Auf dass sie eine bessere Zukunft vorfinden, in der wir uns verwirklicht sehen. Ist das nicht auch deine Absicht?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003090_EMETSELCH<tab>Do not presume to speak of <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> future!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003090_EMETSELCH<tab>Unvollkommener! Sprich nicht von meinen Absichten!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003100_EMETSELCH<tab>And <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>! Why waste your final moments in futile defiance?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003100_EMETSELCH<tab>Und du? Hast du immer noch nicht verstanden?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003110_EMETSELCH<tab>Weary wanderer─you've no fight left to fight! No life left to live!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003110_EMETSELCH<tab>Es ist aus. Es gibt nichts mehr, wofür du kämpfen kannst. Dein Abenteuer ist vorüber.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003120_EMETSELCH<tab>Hah hah hah hah hah! You see! The Light will not be denied!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003120_EMETSELCH<tab>Haha! Sieh nur! Das Licht bahnt sich seinen Weg!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003130_EMETSELCH<tab>Surrender to your fate, and let the transformation take you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003130_EMETSELCH<tab>Wehre dich nicht! Lass geschehen, was geschehen muss!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003140_EMETSELCH<tab>Rise up in madness and fury! Devour the vermin infesting the land which is rightfully ours!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003140_EMETSELCH<tab>Erhebe dich! Werde zum Boten unserer Rache! Vertilge die Sünder, die uns unsere Welt geraubt haben!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003150_THANCRED<tab>Now, Ryne! Now!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003150_THANCRED<tab>Ryne, jetzt!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003160_EMETSELCH<tab>Bah!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003160_EMETSELCH<tab>Pah!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003170_THANCRED<tab>Hng!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003170_THANCRED<tab>Hrg!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003180_RYNE<tab>Fight it... You have to hold on!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003180_RYNE<tab>Du darfst<var 1D /var>... nicht aufgeben!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003190_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>If you had the strength to take another step, could you do it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003190_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Wenn du die Kraft für einen weiteren Schritt hättest<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003200_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Could you save our worlds?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003200_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>... würdest du dann meine Welt, würdest du dann alle Welten retten?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You know I could!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ja. Ich schaff's.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>What, all by myself?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Da fragst du noch?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003210_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Heh.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003210_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>He.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003220_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Take it. We fight as one!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003220_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Dann ... Dann lass es uns tun!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003230_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>This world is not yours to end...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003230_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Diese Welt ist noch nicht am Ende!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003240_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>This is our future. Our story.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003240_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Dies ist unsere Geschichte! Unser Abenteuer!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003250_EMETSELCH<tab>No... It can't be...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003250_EMETSELCH<tab>Was<var 1D /var>... Du?<var 1D /var>... Das kann nicht sein<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003260_EMETSELCH<tab>Bah, a trick of the light. You are a broken husk, nothing more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003260_EMETSELCH<tab>Nein. Das Licht hat mir etwas vorgespielt. Es ist nur <var 08 E905 ((die)) ((der)) /var> Unvollkommene.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003270_EMETSELCH<tab>How can you hope to stand against me alone?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003270_EMETSELCH<tab>Wie kannst du glauben, alleine gegen mich antreten zu können?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003280_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>We stand together!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003280_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>(-???-)<var 08 E905 ((Sie)) ((Er)) /var> ist nicht allein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003290_EMETSELCH<tab>How did─!? ...I'm surprised you can stand at all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003290_EMETSELCH<tab>Wie bist du entkommen? Du solltest tot sein!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003300_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I could not well leave matters half-finished.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003300_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Nicht, bevor ich mich gebührend verabschiedet habe.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003310_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Let expanse contract, eon become instant!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003310_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Äonen sind Momente<var 1D /var>... Was fern ist, ist nah<var 1D /var>... Lass mich die Grenzen von Zeit und Raum sprengen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003320_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Champions from beyond the rift, heed my call!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003320_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Höret mich, tapfere Helden! Sendet uns eure Kraft!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003330_EMETSELCH<tab>Damn you! Damn you all!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003330_EMETSELCH<tab>Das darf nicht wahr sein! Verschwindet, alle!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I challenge you, Emet-Selch.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Entscheide dich, Emet-Selch.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>It ends this day. One way or another, it ends.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Welchen Weg willst du nehmen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003340_EMETSELCH<tab>Very well. Let us proceed to your final judgment.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003340_EMETSELCH<tab>Also gut. Ein letztes Urteil.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003350_EMETSELCH<tab>The victor shall write the tale, and the vanquished become its villain!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003350_EMETSELCH<tab>Der Sieger schreibt die Geschichte des Planeten, der Verlierer wird zu seinem verachteten Widersacher.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003360_EMETSELCH<tab>But come! Let us cast aside titles and pretense, and reveal our true faces to one another!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003360_EMETSELCH<tab>Die Nachwelt soll erfahren, wer hier stand. Streifen wir unsere Titel ab und lüften wir unsere Masken.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003370_EMETSELCH<tab>I am Hades! He who shall awaken our brethren from their dark slumber!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003370_EMETSELCH<tab>(-???-)Ich bin Hades! Der die Welt für seine in Finsternis schlafenden Brüder zurückerobert!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003380_EMETSELCH<tab>I...will...not...yield.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003380_EMETSELCH<tab>Noch nicht<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003390_EMETSELCH<tab>Should I surrender this fight, what will become of it all...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003390_EMETSELCH<tab>Was soll denn aus allem werden?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003400_EMETSELCH<tab>What will become of our triumphs? Our hopes? Our...our despair?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003400_EMETSELCH<tab>Aus unseren Erinnerungen<var 1D /var>... unseren Hoffnungen<var 1D /var>... unserer Ver<var 16 /var>zweif<var 16 /var>lung<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003410_EMETSELCH<tab>What of this anguish which yet burns in my breast even after the passing of eons?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003410_EMETSELCH<tab>Was wird aus dem Groll, der sich seit Äonen in mich frisst?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003420_EMETSELCH<tab>No, no, no! I will not let it all be for naught!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003420_EMETSELCH<tab>Nein! Es kann nicht einfach so enden!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003430_THANCRED<tab>Enough, damn you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003430_THANCRED<tab>Es reicht!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003440_EMETSELCH<tab>Raaargh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003440_EMETSELCH<tab>Uaaargh!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003450_YSHTOLA<tab>Such...<var 1A 02 /var>infernal<var 1A 01 /var>...strength...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003450_YSHTOLA<tab>Stirb schon<var 1D /var>... Ausgeburt der Höllen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003460_EMETSELCH<tab>Raaaaaargh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003460_EMETSELCH<tab>Uaaaaargh!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003470_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ugh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003470_ALPHINAUD<tab>Uaah!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003480_URIANGER<tab>Now! Strike with all thy might!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003480_URIANGER<tab>Jetzt! Bring es zu Ende!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003490_EMETSELCH<tab>Remember...remember us...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003490_EMETSELCH<tab>Vergiss uns nicht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003500_EMETSELCH<tab>Remember...that we once lived...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003500_EMETSELCH<tab>Vergiss nicht, dass wir einst waren.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003510_ALPHINAUD<tab>It's over. Emet-Selch is no more!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003510_ALPHINAUD<tab>Es ist vorbei. Emet-Selch ist nicht mehr.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003520_ALISAIE<tab>More importantly, how do <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> fare?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003520_ALISAIE<tab>Wie geht es dir?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003530_URIANGER<tab>...What dost thou see?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003530_URIANGER<tab>Was siehst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003540_YSHTOLA<tab>His aether... It is...it is as it used to be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003540_YSHTOLA<tab>Sein Äther<var 1D /var>... er ist wieder intakt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003550_YSHTOLA<tab>Her aether... It is...it is as it used to be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003550_YSHTOLA<tab>Ihr Äther<var 1D /var>... er ist ja wieder intakt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003560_YSHTOLA<tab>As a disciple of Zodiark, the Ascian was the Darkness to your Light...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003560_YSHTOLA<tab>Als ein Jünger Zodiarks war der Ascian der dunkle Gegenpol zu deinem Licht<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003570_YSHTOLA<tab>I can but assume that when you set your strength against his, the Light within you was spent.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003570_YSHTOLA<tab>Kann es sein, dass sich das Licht und die Dunkelheit aufgehoben haben, als ihr aufeinanderstießt?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003580_RYNE<tab>No. It's more than that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003580_RYNE<tab>Aber das ist nicht alles.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003590_RYNE<tab>Under the strain of that incredible flood of aether, your soul had begun to break apart. Yet now it seems somehow...restored.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003590_RYNE<tab>Deine Seele wäre unter der Last des Äthers beinahe zerbrochen. Doch jetzt ist sie<var 1D /var>... geheilt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003600_RYNE<tab>I tried to help you before the battle, but Emet-Selch stopped me. So, h-how did you─exactly what did you... Can you tell us what happened?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003600_RYNE<tab>Wie ist das passiert? Ich wollte dir ja helfen, aber<var 1D /var>... Sag schon, was ist geschehen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_Q10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_Q10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I had help from a hero of this world...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ein Held kam mir zur Hilfe.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A10_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'll explain it all another time...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A10_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Also, das ist eine lange Geschichte ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003610_RYNE<tab>I see...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003610_RYNE<tab>Was du nicht sagst<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003620_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Where to start...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003620_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Also<var 1D /var>... wo soll ich anfangen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003630_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I believe I owe you all an apology. And you most especially.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003630_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich schulde euch allen eine Entschuldigung. Besonders dir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_Q11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_Q11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Let's get out of here first!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Lass uns erst hier weg.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A11_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'm tired─we'll leave the lecture for later.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A11_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Du kannst später alles erklären.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A11_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>'Tis good to see you awake, G'raha Tia.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A11_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Gut geschlafen, G'raha Tia?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003640_THANCRED<tab>No arguments here!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003640_THANCRED<tab>Ein exzellenter Vorschlag!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003645_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>うう
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003645_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>schnief

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003650_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Well... 'Tis good to be awake!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003650_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Nie schlief ich besser.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003660_CHAINUZZ<tab>So, those mad souls dove straight into the ocean over there, did they?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003660_CHAINUZZ<tab>Da drüben sind die Verrückten im Meer verschwunden, sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003670_IRVITHE<tab>Ah, a-all I could see from here was the whale, Master Chai...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003670_IRVITHE<tab>Also eigentlich habe ich nur den Wal gesehen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003680_DULIACHAI<tab>'Twas surely Alphinaud and those friends of his! They did something <var 1A 02 /var>heroic<var 1A 01 /var>, mark my words!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003680_DULIACHAI<tab>Es war ganz bestimmt der süße Alphinaud mit seinen Freunden! Sie haben eine Heldentat vollbracht, ich sag's dir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003690_DULIACHAI<tab>You need only look up there for proof of that!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003690_DULIACHAI<tab>Sieh nur hoch zum Himmel, da hast du den Beweis!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003700_CHAINUZZ<tab>As you say, my love.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003700_CHAINUZZ<tab>Ja, sicher, meine Liebe.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003710_CHAINUZZ<tab>They're sure to be back─any moment now. Any moment...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003710_CHAINUZZ<tab>Jeden Augenblick müssen sie hier sein. Da, sieh nur<var 1D /var>...!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003720_DULIACHAI<tab>They are coming back, aren't they? I couldn't bear the thought of...of...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003720_DULIACHAI<tab>Wenn sie nicht zurückkommen<var 1D /var>... dann<var 1D /var>... dann wäre ich<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003730_DULIACHAI<tab>(SOBBING)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003730_DULIACHAI<tab>Untröstlich<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003740_CHAINUZZ<tab>There, there, dear. Everything will be all right...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003740_CHAINUZZ<tab>Nicht doch<var 1D /var>... Wer wird denn gleich weinen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003750_GRITHIL<tab>There! There! Look, over there! Over at the beach!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003750_GRITHIL<tab>Seht mal! Da, am Strand!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003760_IRVITHE<tab>Ho there!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003760_IRVITHE<tab>Heee!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003770_GRITHIL<tab>Greetings!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003770_GRITHIL<tab>He-hooo!Hier rüber!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003780_CHAINUZZ<tab>You all right!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003780_CHAINUZZ<tab>Lebt ihr noch?Die leben noch?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003790_DULIACHAI<tab>Welcome baaack!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003790_DULIACHAI<tab>Hier sind wir!Mein Held!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003800_ALPHINAUD<tab>I didn't think...we'd be swimming...the <var 1A 02 /var>whole<var 1A 01 /var> way back...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003800_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ich hatte nicht gedacht<var 1D /var>... dass wir den ganzen Weg<var 1D /var>... zurückschwimmen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003810_ALPHINAUD<tab>Heavens...heavens... Take me...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003810_ALPHINAUD<tab>Bei den Sieben Himmeln<var 1D /var>... Ich kann nicht mehr<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003820_ALISAIE<tab>Alphinaud!? Oh, hells...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003820_ALISAIE<tab>Alphinaud!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003830_RYNE<tab>Wait! Where's Urianger!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003830_RYNE<tab>Wo ist Urianger! Hat ihn jemand gesehen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003840_THANCRED<tab>He must have fallen behind...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003840_THANCRED<tab>Er war eigentlich direkt hinter mir<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003850_RYNE<tab>But...shouldn't we look for him!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003850_RYNE<tab>Ich werde ihn suchen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003860_YSHTOLA<tab>He'll wash up sooner or later.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003860_YSHTOLA<tab>Lass, er wird schon gleich auftauchen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003870_ALISAIE<tab>For the love of─ Alphinaud!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003870_ALISAIE<tab>Alphinaud!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003880_FEOUL<tab>Welcome back, dear ones!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003880_FEOUL<tab>Willkommen zurück, meine Lieben!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003890_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And thus did salvation come to the First.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003890_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Und so erfuhr der erste Splitter die Erlösung.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003900_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The lamps of Amaurot will fade along with Emet-Selch's enchantments, and the depths shall be as once they were.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003900_MYSTERYVOICEMit dem Schwinden von Emet-Selchs Zauberkraft werden auch die Lichter von Amaurot erlöschen
und der Meeresgraben in Dunkelheit versinken.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003910_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Mt. Gulg will one day fall, and the Talos below yield to wind and rain.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003910_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Der Gulg wird fallen und der Talos wird von Wind und Regen geschliffen werden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003920_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>This tale, too, will fade with time, passing into legend as the world heals and moves on.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003920_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Auch diese Erzählung wird verblassen und in das Reich der Mythen eingehen, während die Welt ihren Frieden findet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003930_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Nevertheless...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003930_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Aber dennoch<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003940_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>As aether obeys the cycle─as death and decay gives way to new life...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003940_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Wie der nicht endende Ätherstrom dem Kreislauf aus Leben und Verfall folgt<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003950_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>So too do the memories we share inspire others to rise to greatness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003950_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>So stiften die Geschichten von Heldentum den kommenden Generationen neuen Mut.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003960_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>For we who walk before may lead those who walk after.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003960_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Wir folgen denen, die vor uns gingen, und führen die, die nach uns kommen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003970_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Your road goes ever on, as does your story. As does your legacy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003970_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Der Weg liegt vor dir und auf ihm unzählige Geschichten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003980_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Such is the hero's lot─to touch the lives of countless others...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003980_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Schreite voran, <var 08 E905 ((Heldin)) ((Held)) /var>, auf dass neue Helden es dir gleichtun.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003990_NEXTHEROBOY<tab>Excuse me! You're the Warrior of Darkness...aren't you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003990_NEXTHEROBOY<tab>Entschuldigung. Du bist <var 08 E905 ((die Kriegerin)) ((der Krieger)) /var> der Dunkelheit, oder?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004000_NEXTHEROBOY<tab>Where are you from, really? And how did you get to be so strong!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004000_NEXTHEROBOY<tab>Verrätst du mir, woher du kommst? Und wie du so stark geworden bist? Ich will auch irgendwann mal so stark werden wie du!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004010_NEXTHEROBOY<tab>Where are you from, really? And how did you get to be so strong!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004010_NEXTHEROBOY<tab>Verrätst du mir, woher du kommst? Und wie du so stark geworden bist? Ich will auch irgendwann mal so stark werden wie du!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004020_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>By your deeds has the blinding Light been banished from these skies, and the sin eaters driven to retreat.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004020_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Dank eurer Taten ist das Licht gebannt und die Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger sind vertrieben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004030_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Although our many hurts will be years in the mending, I have faith that this world and her people will one day be whole once more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004030_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Damit sind nicht alle Wunden geheilt, aber ich bin mir sicher, dass die Welt Schritt für Schritt zur Ruhe kommt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004040_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>With no Rejoining in prospect, the Source need no longer fear the coming of an Eighth Umbral Calamity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004040_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Jetzt, da die Vereinigung verhindert ist, hat der Ursprung keine Achte Katastrophe mehr zu fürchten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004050_YSHTOLA<tab>And with that triumph, the future from which you came will no longer come to pass... Yet, here you still stand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004050_YSHTOLA<tab>Die Zukunft, aus der du kommst, wird nicht eintreten. Du aber bist noch da.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004060_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>...So I do. I wonder if that other age continues onward somehow, cut adrift from time's flow? Or have I simply etched myself a place upon this new block of history?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004060_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Das bin ich, offensichtlich. Vielleicht existiert jener Abschnitt der Zeit irgendwo weiter, losgelöst vom Lauf der Zeit. Oder mein Dasein hat sich untrennbar mit diesem Lauf der Geschichte verwoben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004070_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Either way, this is an unexpected development.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004070_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Jedenfalls birgt dieser Umstand einige neue Komplikationen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004080_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>As the summoner of your souls, my death was meant to release you back to your world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004080_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich ging davon aus, dass mit meinem Tod eure Seelen nicht länger hier gebunden wären und in die Ursprungs<var 16 /var>welt zurückkehren würden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004090_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Yet I am very much alive, and you are still stuck here in the First.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004090_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ihr seid hier, weil ich noch hier bin.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004100_ALPHINAUD<tab>I believe I speak for us all when I say that we are happy to postpone our return if it means your life is spared. We will seek out another way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004100_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wir sind gerne bereit, unseren Aufenthalt etwas zu verlängern, wenn dadurch dein Leben verschont wird. Wir werden einen anderen Weg zurück finden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004110_ALISAIE<tab>Besides, I never had any intention of rushing home. There are people here I still need to thank, and this means I might actually have time to do so.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004110_ALISAIE<tab>Ich wollte sowieso nicht sofort nach Hause. Vorher möchte ich mich noch bei ein paar liebgewonnenen Freunden verabschieden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004120_URIANGER<tab>Yet we dare not neglect our comrades in the Source.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004120_URIANGER<tab>Wir dürfen die Entwicklungen in der Ursprungs<var 16 /var>welt nicht außer Acht lassen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004130_URIANGER<tab>Mistress Tataru, to name but one, will be most anxious to know how things stand with us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004130_URIANGER<tab>Außerdem tun wir Tataru und ihrem sorgenvollen Gemüt keinen Gefallen, wenn wir hier länger verweilen als nötig.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004140_THANCRED<tab>So─you'll just have to make the journey alone for the moment. Be sure and give a full report to our fellow Scions, would you? Oh, and we'd also appreciate any news you can bring us from back home.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004140_THANCRED<tab>Warum gehst du nicht vor, beruhigst unsere Freunde vom Bund und machst dir ein Bild von der Lage?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004150_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Then I see no reason to delay. I can open the path from here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004150_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich kann dir ein Tor öffnen. Hier und jetzt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004160_YSHTOLA<tab>I imagine we each have matters demanding our attention, so let this be a farewell for us all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004160_YSHTOLA<tab>Trennen wir uns fürs Erste. Wir alle haben Dinge, die wir zu erledigen haben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004170_YSHTOLA<tab>Send word when you've resummoned our friend.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004170_YSHTOLA<tab>Bitte benachrichtige uns, wenn <var 08 E905 ((unsere Freundin)) ((unser Freund)) /var> wieder hier eintrifft.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004180_YSHTOLA<tab>Oh, and do try to ensure <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> arrives <var 1A 02 /var>within<var 1A 01 /var> the city next time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004180_YSHTOLA<tab>Und nicht, dass du wieder die Falschen erwischst!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004190_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Hah! Of course! I shall strive for utmost accuracy! No strange forests or unplanned passengers, I promise.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004190_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Selbstverständlich! <var 08 E905 ((Sie)) ((Er)) /var> wird genau hier erscheinen<var 1D /var>... also innerhalb der Stadt, zumindest.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004200_RYNE<tab>I'm a little relieved, to be honest. I would have been terribly lonely if everyone had suddenly disappeared...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004200_RYNE<tab>Wie schön, dass nicht alle sofort heimkehren. Ich hab mich so an euch gewöhnt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004210_RYNE<tab>But I understand that you have to go. Safe journey, Warrior of Darkness. I hope to see you again soon!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004210_RYNE<tab>Komm bitte bald wieder. Ich vermisse dich schon jetzt. Bis ganz bald!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004220_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Just a moment while I attune the portal, then you can be on your way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004220_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Lass mich bitte das Portal justieren, dann schicke ich dich nach Hause.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004230_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>When I was a boy, many long years ago...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004230_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Als ich ein Kind war, vor vielen langen Jahren<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004240_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>...I yearned to stand tall as the heroes of eld.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004240_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Träumte ich davon, eines Tages ein Held zu sein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004250_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But like a fool seeking to pluck the stars from the heavens, my every attempt to reprise their deeds fell short...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004250_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Doch wie die Sterne am Firmament schien mir dieses Ziel unerreichbar fern.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004260_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And then, one day, an all but forgotten dream from my youth stood before me, in the flesh.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004260_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Doch eines Tages stand ein fast vergessener Traum aus meiner Kindheit vor mir, in Fleisch und Blut.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004270_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>A hero who looked to the horizon and beyond, and saw I knew not what.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004270_MYSTERYVOICE<tab><var 08 E905 ((Eine Heldin, die)) ((Ein Held, der)) /var> den Blick fest auf den Horizont gerichtet hatte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004280_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>All I knew was that I would give anything to stand at that hero's side.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004280_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Endlich würde ich mit <var 08 E905 ((ihr)) ((ihm)) /var> auf Abenteuer gehen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004290_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Would that it were so easy...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004290_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Wenn das nur so einfach wäre<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004300_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The glory of the heavens was ever beyond the grasp of those who never thought to reach for it. But if I've gained anything from all of this, it is the courage to stretch out my hand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004300_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Die Herrlichkeit der Sterne ist unerreichbar für den, der nie seine Hand nach ihnen ausstreckt. Den Mut gewonnen zu haben, nach den Sternen zu greifen, ist der größte Schatz auf diesem Abenteuer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004310_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Do you hear me, G'raha Tia? This is no time for sleeping!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004310_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Hörst du mich, G'raha Tia? Schlafen kannst du ein anderes Mal.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004320_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, in the imperial palace in the Source...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004320_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICEIm garleischen Kaiserpalast
- Ursprungswelt -

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004330_ESTINIEN<tab>Hmph.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004330_ESTINIEN<tab>Noch eine Wache, die es erwischt hat<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004340_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>To the west gate! I want to know what's happening there.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004340_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Geht weiter zum Westtor. Ich will wissen, was da vor sich geht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004350_ESTINIEN<tab>Same as the others─struck down with a single blow. An unfortunate day to draw guard duty.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004350_ESTINIEN<tab>Erschlagen mit einem Hieb, genau wie die anderen. Kein guter Tag, um Wachdienst zu schieben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004360_ESTINIEN<tab>Forgive me. These were your people.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004360_ESTINIEN<tab>Entschuldige. Es waren deine Landsleute.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004370_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>We took advantage of this slaughter to slip into the palace. 'Tis not for me to grieve them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004370_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Schon gut. Ich trauere nicht um sie. Und schließlich haben wir es diesem Gemetzel zu verdanken, dass wir überhaupt bis hierhin vordringen konnten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004380_VARIS<tab>(-???-)Aaagh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004380_VARIS<tab>(-???-)Uaaah!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004390_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>That was the Emperor!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004390_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Das war der Kaiser!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004400_ESTINIEN<tab>Wha─ Wait!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004400_ESTINIEN<tab>Was? Warte!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004410_ESTINIEN<tab>(GRUNT)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004410_ESTINIEN<tab>Ts!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004420_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Your Radiance!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004420_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Kaiser Varis!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004430_ZENOS<tab>(-???-)Gaius! You've missed your part in this, I'm afraid.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004430_ZENOS<tab>(-???-)Gaius! Ich fürchte, du hast das Beste verpasst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004440_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Identify yourself, demon!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004440_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Zeig dein wahres Gesicht, Dämon.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004450_ZENOS<tab>You were hoping for the Ascian?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004450_ZENOS<tab>(-???-)Ach, hast du den Ascian erwartet?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004460_ZENOS<tab>The craven shed this skin and fled rather than face me. A pity─I was looking forward to crossing blades with myself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004460_ZENOS<tab>(-???-)Der Feigling hat seine<var 1D /var>... meine Hülle verlassen und die Flucht ergriffen. Zu schade, ich hätte zu gern die Klingen mit mir selbst gekreuzt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004470_ZENOS<tab>But I cannot deny the feeling of satisfaction...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004470_ZENOS<tab>(-???-)Aber es tut gut<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004480_ZENOS<tab>Body and soul, reunited at last!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004480_ZENOS<tab>(-???-)Endlich wieder in seiner eigenen Haut zu stecken!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004490_ESTINIEN<tab>What now? The game continues, but the pieces have changed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004490_ESTINIEN<tab>Was jetzt? Spielen wir weiter, nur mit neuen Figuren?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004500_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Only if we trust in a paragon's words─a mistake I do not intend to repeat.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004500_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Ich werde nicht noch einmal auf eure Tricks hereinfallen<var 1D /var>- Dämon!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004510_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>(CRY)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004510_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Uaaaah!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004520_VARIS<tab>Gaius!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004520_VARIS<tab>Gaius!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004530_VARIS<tab>He speaks...the truth...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004530_VARIS<tab>Es ... Es ist wahr<var 1D /var>... Es ist alles wahr<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004540_VARIS<tab>Elidibus is gone... Tore a hole into the rift...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004540_VARIS<tab>Elidibus ist fort<var 1D /var>... Hat sich durch einen Spalt in der Luft gezwängt, die feige Ratte<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004550_VARIS<tab>(GRUNT)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004550_VARIS<tab>Uh<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004560_VARIS<tab>Zenos... My foolish, greedy son...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004560_VARIS<tab>Zenos<var 1D /var>... mein Sohn. Mein einfältiger, gieriger Sohn<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004570_VARIS<tab>Was a second life not enough? Was the Empire too rich a prize to ignore?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004570_VARIS<tab>War es nicht genug, dass dir ein zweites Leben geschenkt wurde? Wolltest du auch noch das Reich für dich allein haben?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004580_VARIS<tab>True freedom for our nation─our people─will never be won by a spoiled princeling! The burden of this throne is beyond you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004580_VARIS<tab>Dummkopf! Wie kannst du die Geschichte unseres Volkes verraten! Deine Selbstherrlichkeit beleidigt den garleischen Thron.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004590_ZENOS<tab>Hmph. 'Tis you, Father, who have struggled with this burden. Simply holding the Empire together has occupied your limited faculties.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004590_ZENOS<tab>Ha<var 1D /var>... Und du? Du hattest ja schon Schwie<var 16 /var>rig<var 16 /var>keiten, das uns anvertraute Reich zusammenzuhalten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004600_ZENOS<tab>But you may take comfort in knowing that I have no intention of pursuing your tedious agenda, nor am I interested in ruling over the Empire's lands.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004600_ZENOS<tab>Aber wisse, dass ich weder die Absichten habe, deine Pläne weiter<var 16 /var>zu<var 16 /var>verfolgen noch über das Land zu herrschen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004610_ZENOS<tab>I came only to remove that which ruins my sport. I will not have my prey stolen by your petty wars and cowardly weapons.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004610_ZENOS<tab>Ich bin nur hier, um dich aus dem Weg zu räumen, du Spielverderber. Ich möchte nicht, dass mir meine Beute von einem lächerlichen Krieg oder einer ehrlosen Waffe weggeschnappt wird.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004620_VARIS<tab>You would kill me just for that...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004620_VARIS<tab>Deswegen tötest du mich? Dann schlag doch zu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004630_ZENOS<tab>I need no other reason. Any and all who interfere with my hunt...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004630_ZENOS<tab>Es ist Grund genug. Denn wer mich bei meiner Jagd stört<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004640_ZENOS<tab>...will not do so twice!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004640_ZENOS<tab>... tut es kein zweites Mal!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004650_VARIS<tab>(SCREAM)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004650_VARIS<tab>Aaaah!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004660_ZENOS<tab>I heard the Ascian speak of Zodiark and Hydaelyn. Even the will of this star is but a construct of our own making...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004660_ZENOS<tab>Ich weiß es von dem Ascian! Zodiark und Hydaelyn<var 1D /var>... Sogar der Wille des Planeten ist nur von Ascian-Hand geschaffen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004670_ZENOS<tab>We shall gorge upon their strength, and then, my friend, our contest shall begin anew.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004670_ZENOS<tab>Ich werde ihre Stärke verschlingen und dann werden wir uns messen, in einem Kampf auf Leben und Tod! <var 08 E905 ((Meine treue Gefährtin)) ((Mein treuer Gefährte)) /var><var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004680_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Zenos!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004680_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Zenos, du Wahnsinniger!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004690_ZENOS<tab>Hmph...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004690_ZENOS<tab>He ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004700_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>(-???-)<var 48 F20223 /var>...May I?<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004700_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>(-???-)<var 48 F20223 /var>Ist hier noch frei?<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004710_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>(-???-)<var 48 F20223 /var>You, I think, are from a time beyond ours. Have you followed in the wake of Emet-Selch?<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004710_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>(-???-)<var 48 F20223 /var>Du bist nicht aus unserer Zeit, oder? Bist du Emet-Selch gefolgt?<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004720_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>(-???-)<var 48 F20223 /var>Nay, there is no cause for alarm. I am simply a shade. Here and not here.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004720_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>(-???-)<var 48 F20223 /var>Hab keine Angst. Ich bin nur ein Schatten. Hier, aber doch nicht hier.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004730_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>I know only that my name is Hythlodaeus, and that this city is a recreation─a phantom moment plucked from the well of history.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004730_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>(-???-)<var 48 F20223 /var>Ich weiß, dass mein Name Hythlodaeus lautet und dass diese Stadt ein Abbild ist. Wiederauferstanden aus den Tiefen der Zeit.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004740_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>These others seem unaware of their pale existence, but I wonder if Emet-Selch's mind was distracted when it came to my reconstitution.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004740_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Die anderen sind sich der Wahrheit nicht bewusst. Sie sind nur Marionetten in diesem Puppenspiel. Ich frage mich allerdings, was Emet-Selch sich bei meiner Erschaffung gedacht hat.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004750_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>A stray thought would have been enough. “Hythlodaeus will realize the truth,” for example. We were...close friends once, you see...<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004750_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Vielleicht war es ein Versehen, vielleicht war es auch Absicht. „Allein Hythlodaeus soll die Wahrheit erkennen“, mag er sich gesagt haben. Wir waren nämlich mal gute Freunde, er und ich.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004760_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Yet in spite of my perception, I play the same role as all the rest─a bit part, meant to bring color and noise to this well-crafted stage. Too much scrutiny, and we shall burst like the fragile bubbles we are.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004760_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Aber meine Rolle ist die gleiche wie die der anderen. Wir sind schmückendes Beiwerk, Statisten, um diese Bühne etwas lebendiger erscheinen zu lassen.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004770_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Thus I tell you again: my presence is naught to concern you. I wish only to share your company whilst we wait.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004770_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Du brauchst also keine Angst vor mir zu haben. Lass mich nur ein bisschen bei dir sein, während du wartest.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004780_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>...If you've come this far, then you know of the catastrophe which awaits us on our “morrow.”<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004780_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Du kennst bestimmt das Schicksal, das uns bevorsteht.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004790_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>The Final Days. What began as isolated incidents soon swelled into a world-spanning threat...<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004790_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Es sind die letzten Tage von Amaurot, das Ende unseres Gestirns.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004800_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>The Convocation of Fourteen─well, it was Thirteen at the time─endeavored to create a will for our star. They would repair the fundamental laws of order and halt the spread of destruction.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004800_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Der Konvent der Vierzehn<var 1D /var>- so hieß er, obwohl es da nur noch dreizehn waren<var 1D /var>- beschloss, dem Planeten einen Willen zu geben, um die Ordnung der Naturgewalten wie<var 16 /var>der<var 16 /var>her<var 16 /var>zu<var 16 /var>stel<var 16 /var>len und die Zerstörung aufzuhalten.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004810_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>But creation on such a scale required an immense source of power...<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004810_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Aber eine Schöpfung dieser Größenordnung erfordert eine immense Kraftquelle.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004820_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Of those of us who still lived, nearly half offered up their lives in the name of salvation.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004820_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Um diese Kraft zu spenden, opferte beinah die Hälfte von uns ihre Leben.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004830_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>And from their sacrifice, Zodiark was born. Just as we had hoped, He reached forth and halted the march of oblivion.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004830_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Aus ihrem Opfer wurde Zodiark geboren. Er erfüllte unsere Hoffnung und gebot der Verwüstung Einhalt.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004840_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>...Yet oh how the star had suffered. So many species lost. The land was blighted, the waters poisoned, and even the wind had ceased to blow.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004840_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Doch das Gestirn hatte schon zu viel gelitten. Die Vielfältigkeit des Lebens war erblasst, das Land verdorben, das Wasser vergiftet und selbst der Wind hatte aufgehört zu wehen. <var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004850_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Once more did our people give of themselves to Zodiark. Another half of our race sacrificed to cleanse the world; to ensure that trees and grasses and myriad tiny lives would sprout and grow and flourish.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004850_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Wir wandten uns ein zweites Mal an Zodiark. Wieder opferte sich die Hälfte meines Volkes, um die Welt zu reinigen. Damit das Gras und die Bäume abermals erblühen und sich alles Leben von Grund auf neu entfalten könne.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004860_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>The cycle of life had begun anew, and we reconsidered the means by which we might protect it.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004860_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Der Kreislauf des Lebens begann von Neuem und wir überdachten, wie wir ihn wahren könnten.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004870_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>The Convocation decided thus: we would nurture our world until it was bursting with vitality. Then, when the time was right, we would offer some portion of its living energy to Zodiark...<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004870_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Der Konvent entschied, dass wir die Welt pflegen würden, bis sie ihren Puls und ihren Atem wiedergefunden hätte. Dann würden wir einen Teil ihrer Lebenskraft Zodiark schenken.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004880_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>In return, He would restore to us those brethren whose souls had fed His strength, and together we would resume our role as stewards.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004880_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Dafür würde er uns die Seelen unserer Brüder zurückgeben, die ihn mit ihren Leben gestärkt hatten, und zusammen mit ihnen würden wir unsere Rolle als Beschützer der Welt fortführen.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004890_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>There were, however, those who disagreed with this plan. They argued that enough had been sacrificed to Zodiark─that this new world should belong to the lives newly born.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004890_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Aber nicht alle stimmten zu. Es gab solche, die meinten, dass es genug der Opfer an Zodiark war, und dass die neue Welt denjenigen gehören sollte, die neu in sie hineingeboren wurden.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004900_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>These dissidents surrendered their life energies in the creation of Hydaelyn, an incarnation of their opposing belief. And for the first time in history, our people stood divided... Know you, then, how this conflict ended?<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004900_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Sie gaben ihre Lebenskraft, um Hydaelyn zu erschaffen, die Gegenspielerin. Zum ersten Mal war unser Volk gespalten. Und du weißt, wie dieser Konflikt endete, nicht wahr?<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004910_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>...Hm, I thought you might.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004910_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Dachte ich es mir.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004920_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Emet-Selch has ever been a champion for the will of Zodiark.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004920_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Emet-Selch ist ein treuer Anhänger Zodiarks.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004930_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>The original plan may have been set back by millennia, but he will have not abandoned his course. He will pay the price for our return by whatever means is necessary.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004930_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Er will den jahrtausendealten Plan des Konvents ausführen und seine Brüder zurückholen. Ungeachtet der Opferzahl.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004940_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>And though he may carry himself with a certain glib ease, Emet-Selch is not a man to bear his burdens lightly. In fact, I imagine they have only grown heavier with every passing century...<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004940_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Obwohl er zu Schimpf und Klage neigt, ist er ein pflichtbewusster Mann. Er trägt die Verantwortung schon so lange ganz allein auf seinen Schultern.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004950_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>...'Tis truly a terrible weight he has chosen to carry.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004950_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Es ist eine schwere Bürde, die auf ihm lastet.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004960_AMAUROTADMINISTRATOR<tab><var 48 F20223 /var><var 29 EB02 /var>...<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004960_AMAUROTADMINISTRATOR<tab><var 48 F20223 /var><var 29 EB02 /var>?<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004970_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>It seems your turn has come. Pray do not let me keep you.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004970_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Du bist an der Reihe. Geh nur.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004980_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>...Ah, there was one last thing. You walk with another at your side, yes?<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004980_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Eine Sache noch. Du bist nicht alleine, richtig? Da ist noch ein Zweiter.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004990_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Nay, I see no definite form...just the faintest suggestion of a second soul. I doubt it visible to anyone but me.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004990_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Nein, ich sehe keine Form, ich spüre nur den leisen Hauch einer zweiten Seele. Wahrscheinlich unsichtbar für alle außer mich.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_005000_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Otherwise, I assume only <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> can see and hear this ethereal companion?<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_005000_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Und dich. Du kannst ihn auch sehen und hören, oder?<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_005010_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Hm hm hm... Your connection is hardly a coincidence. In our time, the two of you were one─the color of your souls tells the tale.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_005010_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Hm, hm, hm ... Ja, das ist kein Zufall. In unserer Zeit wart ihr eins. Man sieht es an der Farbe eurer Auren.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_005020_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>A hue that distinctive cannot be mistaken, no matter how thin the soul is spread.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_005020_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Es ist ein ganz besonderer Ton, so einzigartig, dass man ihn wiedererkennt, egal wie oft er auch gespalten sein mag.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_005030_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Hah! This is just the kind of fate I might expect for one such as he. Surely Emet-Selch has recognized the hint of “him” in you...?<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_005030_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Dieses Schicksal sieht ihm ähnlich. Emet-Selch wird erkannt haben, dass ein Teil von ihm in dir steckt.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_005040_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Hah! This is just the kind of fate I might expect for one such as she. Surely Emet-Selch has recognized the hint of “her” in you...?<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_005040_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Dieses Schicksal sieht ihr ähnlich. Emet-Selch wird erkannt haben, dass ein Teil von ihr in dir steckt.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_005050_AMAUROTADMINISTRATOR<tab><var 48 F20223 /var><var 29 EB02 /var>...?<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_005050_AMAUROTADMINISTRATOR<tab><var 48 F20223 /var><var 29 EB02 /var>!<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_005060_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Fare you well, my new old friend. May you find what it is you seek.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_005060_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Geh, mein Kind. Auf dass du findest, was du suchst.<var 48 01 /var>
